133a3(pha): ka sgyu ma'i sprul pa yin// sgyu ma sems kyi sprul pa yin// sems nyid chos nyid sprul pa yin// chos nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin// thams cad sems kyi
133a4(pha): rang bzhin to// sems nyid 'od gsal chen po la// rin chen gling gi sa rdo bzhin// nam yang 'gyur ldog gsal 'grib med// sems nyid rtogs na ye shes te//
133a5(pha): sangs rgyas gzhan nas pa tsal du med// ma btsal bzhag pas lhun gyis grub// blo'i rtog pa rang sa rA grol// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid yin// ma shes rtog pa
133a6(pha): sna tshogs la// spang blang dgag sgrub 'khor bar 'khyams// 'khor 'das rig dang ma rig khyad// skad cig dus kyi khyad la sa med// de bas rig pa gnad du bsnun//
133a7(pha): rang la gnas pa'i ye shes de// rang gis rang nyid shes par bya'o// ma rig rang khar spyod pa yis// gnyis 'dzin thams cad 'khor bas te// rang bzhin shes
133b1(pha): pa'i ting 'dzin la// gnyis med rtogs pa mya ngan 'das// 'dus byas chos kun kun rdzob la// 'dus ma byas pa don dam ste// srid pa 'khor ba'i chos rnams la//
133b2(pha): rnam par rtog byed chos yin la// rnam par mi rtog chos nyid dri// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi yul la ni// rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs su// snang spyod shes pa rnam shwe
133b3(pha): la// de rnams thams cad rtog med kyi// skye 'gag med pa'i shes rab kyis// rang bzhin shes pa ye shes yin// sems ni kun gyi mkhan po la//
133b4(pha): sems byung ma rig rtog tshogs te// sems dang sems byung gnyis su med// sems la sems ni ma mchis pas// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal te// mtsho/
133b5(pha): dang chu'i rlabs bzhin la// gnyis su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo// gnyis med rtogs na ye shes yin// theg pa thams cad mthar thug gi/ don gyi ye shes gcig 'dod kyang //
133b6(pha): ye shes ye shes khyad par che// ye shes ldan pas don kun shes// tshogs gnyis tshogs chen bsags las byung // mdor na thams cad sems yin te// rin chen
133b7(pha): sems las ma gtogs pa'i// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// de bas chos rnams thams cad kun// rang gi sems su rtogs par gyis// 'bras bu gsang
134a1(pha): ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ kun rtog sems kyi byung tshul gyi khe'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
134a2(pha): kun gzhi chos nyid stong pa'i mkha'// rang snang reg pa 'od du shar// de nyid gzung 'dzin ma reg 'khrul// khams drug phye nang snod bcud chags// rig pa'i rtsa la de srid
134a3(pha): pa'i rlabs// g.yos pa'i drod las rlangs byung nas// sred pa'i zil pa chu ru 'khyil// lbu ba'i rdul phran sprin bzhin 'khrigs// zhen pa'i rang gzugs sra ba yi//
134a4(pha): sa chags kha dog 'od lnga yis// 'thas pa'i gzugs brnyan rin chen lnga// rtog pa lnga 'am brgyad lngas su// ri bo ri bran rgya mtsho dang // gling bzhi gling phran mu khyud bcus//
134a5(pha): chags 'jig stong gnas bcas pa ru// bskal pa bskal phran rims kyis su// rtog pa'i rlung gas rab bskyed nas// 'ja' tshon 'od kyi tshul du chags// snang zhing
134a6(pha): bsten pas snod yin la// 'dus byas yin pas 'jig rten zhes// thun mong spyi yi snang ba yin// khyad par gang zag dang snang la// rnam par mi rtog mkha' yin
134a7(pha): la/ rtog pa skad cig dran byed des// 'byung ba so sor gsal ba la// phyogs gcig snang ba cig car du// snod kyi 'jig rten chags pa yin// der snang grol ba
134b1(pha): 'jig pa ste// skye 'gag mi rtag 'jig rten zhes// 'dus byas chos kyi mtshan nyid yin// kun gzhi yid byed gzung 'dzin gyi// rnam par shes pa yid kyi lus//
134b2(pha): gzugs su med pa'i rnam pa can// bar do dang ni gzugs med khams// sems can rnams la rtog pa yin// rnam shes dran pa'i gzung 'dzin la// gzugs dang/
134b3(pha): kha dog snang ba kun// chags zhan 'dzin pa che rwa skyes pas// de dang de'i lus snang ba// gzugs la chags pas gzugs khams byung // dran byed gzugs
134b4(pha): kyi bag chags la// zhen pas rnam par smin pa'i lus// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel tshogs pa las// dus gsum bskyed nas 'dod khams kyi// gzugs dang rtog pa/
134b5(pha): tha dad pa// sems can gcig ga lus la yang // 'ga' zhig gis ni skyabs su mthong // 'ga' zhig zas dang grogs su lta// 'ga' zhig yul dang gnas
134b6(pha): su mthong // gcig las nges med sna tshogs byung // sems can blo rigs mi gcig pas// la la'i bde ba la la'i sdug/ la la'i sdug bsngal la la'i bde//
134b7(pha): de bzhin du ni nyin dang mtshan// dgra dang gnyen dang 'phel 'grib dang // zas dang dug dang skye dang 'gag/ legs nyes skyon yon sna tshogs pa// go zlog mi gcig sgra
135a1(pha): tshogs dang // thun mong 'dod yon zhen pa ni// 'dod khams lus can sems can byung // khams gsum 'di dag sems gcig kyang // gzung
135a2(pha): 'dzin ma gcig so sor byung // gzugs med 'dzin pa'i sems la chags// gti mug shas che btang snyoms gnas// rnam shes rtog pa gzhi la med// rtog pa de 'gag zhi ba yin//
135a3(pha): gzugs khams spyi'i yul la chags// kha dog gzugs la zhen pa yis// chags sdang gnyis las 'dod shas che// bsam gtan dga' ba de'i gnas la yengs// 'jug tu sdang
135a4(pha): sems cher skyes nas// 'chi 'pho ltung ba'i sdug bsngal myong // 'dod khams 'dod yon phyi nang la// dug lnga'i snang ba rgyas pa yi// tshor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu che/
135a5(pha): rnam rtog rags pa ye shes rags// las kyi 'bras bu myur ba yin// rten pa lus la rten byed sems// rnam shes srog gi rten yod phyir// rnam par smin pa'i/
135a6(pha): lus zhes bya// khams la gnas pa'i sems can la// rmi lam dang ni sgyu ma bzhin// bden par ma grub bden pa'i tshul// rkyen rnams tshogs pa'i 'khru/
135a7(pha): 'khor la// skye ba mi zad rgyun du spyod// chos nyid dran na gnyid sad 'dra// skad cig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sangs// 'gron po pha yul bslab pa bzhin//
135b1(pha): rang gi sa la dogs med du// mi 'gyur rI rab 'dra bar spyod// phyi nang snod bcud snang srid la// 'dzin pa'i sems dang gzung ba'i yul// nyi ma dang ni 'od
135b2(pha): bzhin du// sems kyi rtogs pas lhan cig skyes// snod bcu de gnyis pa sa sa ru// snod med sems can gnas pa dang // bcud med snod ni stong pa gnyis//
135b3(pha): sems kyi rtog pa ma bral na// skad cig tsam yang 'gyur ba med// 'dus byas phyi nang snod bcud 'di// sra zhing mkhregs yang snying po med// skad cig rkyen gyis /
135b4(pha): 'jig par nus// sems nyid 'ad gsal chen po 'di// sus kyang mi shig sa rdo rje'i brag/ 'bras bu gsadra ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen pa dri ma med pa'i snying
135b5(pha): po la sa/ srid pa snod bcud chags lugs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // ma rig kun gzhi rnam rtog de// yid byed nyon mongs rnam
135b6(pha): shes kyi snga// gzugs med rnams la snang mun dang // gzugs khams 'od kyi lus dang ni// 'dod khams snga ma'i bag chags kyi// rmi lam lta bu'i dran
135b7(pha): pa de// yid kyi lus yin snga ma 'dis// phyi ma'i nying 'tshams sbyor ba yis/ khar dor yid kyi lus zhes bya// 'bras bu las dang rkyen gyis bsgyur/ bar sna
136a1(pha): rlangs dang 'dra ba ste// rnam shes 'khyams po las kyi rlung // thogs med kun tshungs dbang po ldan// rdzu 'phrul lha mig stobs dang
136a2(pha): ldan// 'dod pa'i dbang gis skye ba len// chags sdang gnyis kyis yid g.yos nas// re dgos gnyis kyis yid skrag cing // rgyud lnga'i rgyu mthun lam du zhugs/
136a3(pha): skyabs dang rten 'chol mngal dang gnas// 'dod pa'i yul mthong der zhugs pas// lAs 'thun rkyen 'jom bag chags 'gags// dri za yid kyi rtog pa de//
136a4(pha): khab len rdo yis lcags sdud bzhin// pha ma gnyis kyi khu khrag de// skad cig las kyi rlung gis bsdus// snyigs ma spyir zags dngas ma gsum//
136a5(pha): gcig tu 'dres pas dran med gyur// gti mug mun pa'i snang ba las// skye ba med pa'i rang mdangs shar// 'od lnga'i gong bu 'byung ba lnga'i// khams kyi rang
136a6(pha): bzhin rnam shes ni// rnam mkha'i go 'byed rlung gis skyed// chu yis sdud cing me yis smin// sa yis sra zhing gzugs su grub// 'dod chags las skyed
136a7(pha): rlung gi lus// zhag bdun chu bzhin mer mer po// zhe sdang las gyur mkhris pa'i lus// zhag bdun ltar ltar zho bzhin chags// gti mug las skyes pade kan
136b1(pha): lus// zhag bdun gor gor mar bzhin 'gyur// zhag bdun rnam shes dug gsum skyed// lte ba'i rtsa mdud gru gsum chags// srog shing a ba d+hU ti las//
136b2(pha): 'byung lnga'i 'khor lo lta ba chags// zhag bdun 'khrang 'gyur nya lta bu// zhag res nyis 'gyur rtsa chags pas// zla ba gnyis na 'khor lo lnga'i// rtsa 'dab
136b3(pha): chags pa sa yan lag 'bur// 'go 'dod rus sba la rnam pa can// nang dang rus dang phyi ru sha// pha ma'i dngas ma'i stobs las tshugs// rang gi rnam shes dran pa
136b4(pha): tshor/ dbang po lnga'i rtsa rnams chags// lus po stod che smad 'phrar 'gyur// khyab 'jug sprul gyi rnam pa can// pho mo rdo rje dril bu ltar// chags pas phag pa'i
136b5(pha): rnam pa can// zla ba lngaldan dbang po tshangs// rus tshigs srog shing thams cad tshugs// rtsa dang chu rgyus kun tu 'brel// sha'i lha tshangs pags pa skyed// don lnga
136b6(pha): snod drug phyi nang 'brel// mgo che bas seng ge bzhin// phyi nang rlung gis 'gul bar nus// zla drug sra dang ba spu skyes// gzugs tshangs ma'i rnam pa can// pho mo'i
136b7(pha): rigs rnams 'dod par 'gyur// bu yi lte ba ma yi snying // rtsa 'brel ma yi zas zos pas// dngas ma snying khrag rtsa la zhugs// bu'i lus zungs bskyed pa
137a1(pha): yis/ sha rgyas mi thung rnam pa can// snga phyi gnyis kwa'i rtog pa 'char// las kyi chags sdang skyod tsam na// ma'i mngal nas sdug bsngal
137a2(pha): myong // skabs su bde ba'i bsam gtan ga nas// zla ba brgyad na phyi nang gi/ skye mched thams cad rdzogs pa'i yi// rtog pa g.yos pas mi gzugs so//
137a3(pha): zla ba dgu na phyi yul gyis// gzung 'dzin dbang po'i sgo rnams bye// mig bye rna ba 'byar ba phye// sna bye lce skyed lus kyi ni// reg bya 'dzin pas bsgyur bar byed//
137a4(pha): pho mo ma'i g.yas g.yon nas// zla ba ngo bcu bsgyur byed kyi// rlung gis bsgyur nas 'phen byed rlung // phyi ru 'gul zhing skye bar byed// tshor ba 'jur dmig rtser dang //
137a5(pha): mtshungs// shes bzhin ldan la sgyu ma bzhin// mngal gnas chos dbyings bde chen du// skye med dang las skye ba yis// rang bzhin sprul pa'i dge slong ste// 'khor
137a6(pha): ba'i chos dang bral ba'i las// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon nyid// mngal gyi phru ma'i chos gos la// spyi bor thar mo sbyar ba'i phyag/ rims bzhin bskyed pa'i khrims
137a7(pha): kyis gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa a dang haM// gcer bu sgra dang kha spu sreg/ gang la chags med gnas nas 'byung // 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams//
137b1(pha): sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// zla ba bcu na sa bcu nyid// sems can sna bcu'i dbang phyug go// thog ma nyid nas lhun grub pas// skye ba sprul pa'i sku yin no// skyes
137b2(pha): nas zla gsum lo gcig na// rtsa ni stong phrag brgyad cu rdzogs// srin bu'i rigs ni brgyad khri dang // rang lus 'dom gang gru bzhi lnga// rlung chad bcu drug lo la rdzogs//
137b3(pha): nyar lnga thig le so lnga na// rig pa lus kyi rtsal rnams rdzogs// shi ba stong pa chos sku gsum// bar do longs spyod rdzogs sku'i lus// mngal nas skye ba sprul pa'i
137b4(pha): sku/ rdo rje lus kyi rang bzhin la// sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// lha dang lha min sgra mi snyan// bsod nams mthu yis bde la zhe na// lam la 'jug pa'i
137b5(pha): gnyen po dman// ngan song mi khom gnas rnams ni// mi dges mthu yis sdug bsngal myong // byang chub lam la 'jug mi shes// gling gnyis dman pa'i lus
137b6(pha): rnams la// bsod nams dman pas btsal ma tshang // byang chub lam gyi rten mi rung // tshul khrims sdom pa skye mi 'gyur// rtsa rlung thig le rdzogs pa yis//
137b7(pha): mngal nas rdo rje'i lus 'di la// rten pa rtse gcig byang chub 'grug/ mi mdzad khams kyi 'dzam gling du// sangs rgyas thams cad mi gzugs kyis// rdo rje
138a1(pha): 'chang du sangs rgyas te// gdul bya blo dman rnams kyis don// khyim spangs rab byung tshul du 'byon// rab byung sdig pa'i chos dang bral/
138a2(pha): bdud rnams thams cad 'pham par byed// yon tan kun gyi rten du 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su bzungs// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i//
138a3(pha): mya ngan 'das pa'i lam chen po// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhi rten mchog/ rdo rje'i lus las 'byung ba yin// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i/
138a4(pha): snying po las/ rnam smin lus kyi grub tshul gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // sems kyi bcings grol lus kyi gnad// lus gnas/
138a5(pha): rtsa yi gnas lugs te// rtsa yi gnas lugs ma shes na// 'dod khams gzhan dang khyad par med// dkar dmar khams dang 'du byed yid// tshogs pa gcig/
138a6(pha): pa'i rnam smin lus// dug gsum sku gsum skyed pa yis// thog mar srid pa las kyi rlung // lte bar rtsa mdud gru gsum chags// de nas lus dang rtsa rnam
138a7(pha): bskyed/ rtsa mdud 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// d+hU ti srog rgya srog ging ltar// yan man skyed nas 'khor lo lnga// zangs dung sba ba gdugs rtsibs bzhin// de yi snying po
138b1(pha): dngas ma'i rtsa// dbu mchos nyid don gyi rtsa// skye ba med pa'i lam chen po// yAr sna spyi gtsug haM la zug/ mar sna gsang ba'i gnas su zug/ spyi gtsug rtsa
138b2(pha): 'dab sum cu gnyis// ro 'dus bcu drug snying khar brgyad// lte brla drug cu ru bzhi drangs// bde skyong nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor// rtsa rnams de las bskyed pa yis//
138b3(pha): dpag bsam shing che na rgyas pas te// de dkyil snying khar 'dus pa yis// snying zhes rnam shes srog gi rten// sha yi dngas ma dbu ma'i rtsa// drod kyi dang sa ma a
138b4(pha): thung me// thig le dang sa ma bde chen haM// rlung gi dngas ma srog gi rlung // yid kyi dngas ma kun gzhi sems// dngas ma lnga 'dus rU pa na// snying po ye shes don
138b5(pha): gyi lha/ thog ma'i sangs rgyas spyi mes bzhugs// de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gang // dbu ma lnga ldan zhes bya ba// 'byung ba bzhi'i dang sra ma las// d+hu ti
138b6(pha): phyogs bzhir dus mnyam du// mdun rtsa kha dog dkar po na// yar lta hUM la mar lta du// sa bon dbyibs su rtsi gnas yod// kun gzhi rnam shes de nas rgyu//
138b7(pha): g.yas rtsa kha dag ser po na// yar lho tra la mar lta spre// nyon mongs can yid de na rgyu// rgyab rtsa kha dog dmar po na// yar lta hri la mar lta NAM// yid kyi rnam
139a1(pha): shes de nas rgyu// g.yon rtsa kha dog ljang zhun// yar lta ha la mar lta tri// sgo lnga'i rnam shes de nas rgyu// rtsa bzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin la//
139a2(pha): dbus rtsa kha dog dkar gsal nang // skye med don gyi rgyal po ni// oM dang ma yi sa bon gnas// bag la nyal gyi rnam shes rgyu// rtswa lnga rdo rje rtse lnga bzhin// gnas
139a3(pha): pa rdo rje'i lus zhes bya// rdo rje lus kyi gnas ldan// rig pa sems kyi gnad lnga yod// snyoms 'jug dus su spyi gtsug gnad// rmi lam dus su mgrin pa gan//
139a4(pha): gnyid kyi dus su snying kha na// tha mal dus su lte ba na// rtsol ba'i dus su gsang gnas na// rtsa de rnams las gyes pa yi// pho rtsa ka li dpa' bo g.yas// mo
139a5(pha): rtsa a li dpa' mo g.yon// gnyis med lhan skyes he ru ka/ de rnams 'dus pa'i gtso bo gsum// g.yas pa thabs kyi ro ma dang // g.yon pa shes rab rkyang ma gnyis//
139a6(pha): yar sna sna bug klad pa'i dkyil// 'khyogs nas 'khor lo lnga la rgyu// mar sna lte bar mar la gug/ dbu mar rtsa gsum lnga 'dus pas// gtum mo me yi rtsa mdud grub
139a7(pha): de las drod rnams thams cad bskyed// g.yas rtsa 'khor ba g.yon pa na// mya ngan 'das pa'i rtsa yin no// rtsa yi gtso bo dgasum las// snying khar dngas snyigs
139b1(pha): lnga bye nas// dngas ma mthong byed shel spug can// sgra gcan ro 'dzin tshor ba dang // reg pa ltas byed ces bya lnga// mig dang rna ba sna lce dang // lus kyi pags pa rnams
139b2(pha): la zug/ sgo lnga lus kyi snang ba 'char// mar la snyigs ma'i rtsa lnga nas// ro ma nyi ma rkyang ma zla// rgyab nas dri chen mdun nas chu// dbus nas kun lnga'i thig
139b3(pha): le 'bab// 'dus pa dbu ma'i mar sna nas// thig le 'bab pa skyes pa ring // bu med dung can glang can ma// ri dgas pad can sdeng can rigs// ro rkyang gnyis
139b4(pha): po gzung 'dzin rtsa// dbu ma gzung 'dzin rnam par spangs// lam gyi nyams len de gsum ste// rgyal po dbang du 'dus pa na// 'brangs rnams cha ma la phebs
139b5(pha): pa bzhin// rtsa gsum dbang bsdus rtsa gzhan rnams// shugs kyis lam du slong ba yin// rtsa yi ming ni gnas pa dang // byed pa'i las la brtags pa ste//
139b6(pha): dbu ma rtsa rnams kun bskyed pas// srog rtsa dpag bsam shing chen de// gang du ma 'gags shes sdug can// kun la khyab pas kun d+ha ra ma// skye med ston pas d+ha/
139b7(pha): ti la/ yar sna khams skyed sgra gcan de// mar sna khams 'dus dung can zer// lnga yi gzugs kyis rdo rje'i rtsa// ro ma thabs kyi nyi ma 'dzin// snyegs ma/
140a1(pha): phal cher 'dzag par byed// rkyang ma shes rab zla ba 'dzin// dngas ma phal cher 'dzag pa yin// spyi gtsug bde chen chu yi rtsa// rtsa 'dab so
140a2(pha): gnyis kha mar lta// de la ming can rtsa brgyad gnas// mi phyed ma ni 'tshogs mar gnas// phra gzugs ma ni spyi bor 'khyil// rtsa ba ma ni sna ba g.yas// g.yon
140a3(pha): pa ma ni rna ba g.yon// them bu ma ni sna ba g.yon na gnas// rus sbal ma ni mdzod spu la// bsgom pa ma ni mig sprin la// dbang po ma ni srog rtsa la'o// mgrin
140a4(pha): pa longs spyod pa'i rtsa// rtsa 'dab bcu drug 'dril mar gu nas// de yi ming can rtswa brgyad la// skyongs ma mchan khung 'phar rtsa'o// rtswa 'jug nu ma'i rtsa gnyis
140a5(pha): so// ma mo lta ba'i dkyil na gnas// mtshon ma sna yi rtse na yad// bsil sbyin dkan dang mchu yi rdza// tshab o la gong mdud pa'i rtsa// rtse ru ma ni snying la
140a6(pha): zug/ mchu ma sdoms kyi rtsa yin no// snying kha chos 'khor nam mkha'i rtsa// rtsa 'dab brgyad po so sor gyis// gzhol ma brang gi gzhung la gnas// dngas mas
140a7(pha): rkangs pa'i 'grel ba'i rtsa// shin tu gzugs can mtshan ma'i rtsa// khyim ma 'og sgo gsum khar 'brel// gsum skor mig gi 'bras bu'i rtsa// 'dod ma rna ba gnyis
140b1(pha): kyi rtsa// skyod ma sna gnyis zug pa'i rtsa// brdul ma lce la zug pa'i rtsa// lte ba sprul 'khor me yi rtsa// rtsa 'dab 'dzings pa drug cu bzhi// bdud 'dul ma ni ba spu'i
140b2(pha): rtsa/ phyin ma 'og sgo gnyis kyi rtsa// yid bzangs pus mo'i snyan gong rtsa// rgyu sbyin brla yi rtsa bo che// sbyor bral ma ni byin par gnas// bsdug gu rkang lag sor
140b3(pha): mo'i rtsa// grub ma rkang pa'i bol gnyis las// 'tshe ba ma rkang 'theb spu 'dzin rtsa// gsang gnas bde skyod rlung gi rtsa// rtsa 'dab nye rwa brgyad spyi bor 'brel//
140b4(pha): mdzes ma gsang gnas sgo gsum rtsa// la ma mtshan ma'i g.yas na zug/ ya na mtshan ma'i g.yon na zug/ ra sa dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa// a ba rtswa yis
140b5(pha): phyir la 'bud// 'dza bo nang du sdud pa'i rtsa// dkar nag gnas su sdom par byed// lam chen tshor ba'i khams bskyed pa'i// 'phar rtsa chen po bzhi yin no//
140b6(pha): rtsa rnams sum cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas// rlung khams dpa' bo dpa' mo ste// phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag yin// snying dkyil rtsa yi rgyal po ni// ri 'ong
140b7(pha): mig ces bya ba yod// yar 'khyogs rba rlabs gnyis dang 'brel// mtshan khung gnyis nas mkhal mar 'bral// yar 'khyogs snying gi dkar nag
141a1(pha): 'tshams// g.yer ma'i kha bzhin 'byed 'dzum can// phyi mnan phyi yi rtog pa 'gags// nang 'chus nang gi rtog pa 'gags// sems can
141a2(pha): rnams la kha thur lta// snang ba gti mug rnam par 'grib// bsgoms pa'i yon tan 'phred la byed// 'khor 'das gnyis snang sgyu mar 'chang // sangs rgyas
141a3(pha): rnams la kha yar lta// ye shes snang ba 'char bar gnas// bum pa can gyi gyen la 'degaso// rtsa bdud yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor 'jig/ bum pa'i yon tan
141a4(pha): rtsal rdzogs nas// rang snang sku dang zhing khams dang // gzhan snang dpe dang 'od zer mthong // gnad du ma song log 'chus kyis// 'khrul snang skyon ni sna tshogs
141a5(pha): 'byung // spyi bo tshangs bug rnam then rtsa// rtog pa 'gag par byed pa yod// mgrin par a nu tA ra'i rtsa// phyi nang dbugs kyi skad 'byin yod// lte bar gtum mon
141a6(pha): khab rtsa/ 'khros pas drod du 'bar ba yod// 'og sgo 'khor ba 'phel byed rtsa// srid pa 'dzin par byed pa yin// ma tshang ma ning za mA 'gro// gzhan yang
141a7(pha): skyon can rtsa brgyad po// zhar mi bong ma dong ma dang // 'dzings ma 'chus maM 'dar ma'i rtsa// nyal mo mo kham ma'i rigs// skyon can mi khom lus yin pas/
141b1(pha): rdo rje theg pa'i stan mi rung // dbu ma rdo rje'i rtsa sna la// yang dgu mar dgu ro rkyang gnyis// 'khor lo lnga yi rtsa 'dab la// byang sems 'breb pa sum cu gnyis//
141b2(pha): ming med brgya dang bcu gnyis yod// nang gi rtsa lnga gdan rtsa brgyad// 'phar rtsa phyi nang bcu drug ste// rlung mkhris bad kun 'dus pa bzhi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi grangs
141b3(pha): kyi rUta/ bag la nyal ba drug cu gcig/ rlung khrig chu ser rgyu ba rtsa// su ma brgya nyi shu la sogs la// ro rkyang phra kye rigs las byung // stong phrag lnga bcu dbu
141b4(pha): ma'i rigs// stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnas pas// mdor bsdus grangs can brgya khri'o// grangs med rtsa la brjod las 'das// ring ba 'dom gang mtho do nas//
141b5(pha): thung ba spu'i rtse mo tsam// lus ni rtsa yi dra bar 'brel// rlung dang khrag dang thig les gang // rtsa rlung thrig le gang 'khyim pa// rnam snang gang chen mtsho min no// rtsa
141b6(pha): rnams yar 'phel lus bskyed la// bar du mnyam pas zol sdod// tha ma rtsa bskams gud pa yin// nus pa zad pa 'chi ba ste// lus kyi rten 'di rtsa las byung
141b7(pha): rtsa rlung grol na thar pa thob// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pa las/ lam gnas pa rtsa'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste
142a1(pha): bdun pa'o// // rlung gi gnas lugs ma shes na// lus kyi rtsa mdud mI grol zhing // sems kyi gnas lug
142a2(pha): mi rtogs pas// 'gyu byed rtog pa rlung gi gnad// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid de// 'gag pa med pa'i shes rlung // snang srid snod bcud kun la khyab// khyab byed
142a3(pha): rlung gi rang rtsal de// srid po chags byed kun gzhi yi// mkha' la 'du byed yid g.yo rlung // 'udu shes tshor ba g.yos pa las// rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu byung // de las/
142a4(pha): rnam smin 'byung bzhi brten// las kyi rlung gi ming gzugs kyis// lci ba srid pa chags pa'i dbus// rnam shes skye med srog gi rlung // a yi dbyibs su gnas
142a5(pha): nas su/ rtsa rlung thig la thams cad skyed// de na rang bzhin gnasnga pa'i rlung // mngal gnas rlung ni dbu ma ru// shasa? che gnas pa rnam rtog nyung // bsgyur byed
142a6(pha): rlung gi phyir skyes nas// ma dang bral te lte ba chad// nang rlung dran mo phye ru sho r-i// phyi rlung grang mo nang du zhugs// rkyen gyis las rlung zhes bya ste// phyi rol yul
142a7(pha): la rtog pa 'phros// 'jug pa'i rlung gi tshur la bsdus// nang du 'dzin rtog sna tshogs byung // gzung 'dzin ma rig las kyi rlung // 'byung 'jug med par gnas
142b1(pha): pa la/ gnyis med dbu ma'i rlung du brjod// dbu mar gnas pa srog gi rlung // rlung rnams bskyed pa'i rtsa ba ste// de yis kun la khyab pa yis// bar snang stong pa'i
142b2(pha): rlung po de// lung pa che chung ring thung nang // de dang mthun par rgyu ba bzhin// rtsa rnams sbom 'phra ring thung dang // dbyibs dang mthun pa'i rlung gnas te// thams
142b3(pha): cad dbu ma'i rlung du gcig/ srog 'dzin lus kyi snying khar gnas// las su bdag 'dzin dran pa skyed// log na sgro 'bog 'chi bar byed// khyab byed spyi bo'i gtsug
142b4(pha): na gnas// las su tshigs 'gul 'gro rdeg byed// log na zha rengs skyog po 'ong // gyen du rgyu ba mgrin par gnas// skad dang zas kyi phul mdangs byed// log
142b5(pha): na stod kyi nad rnams skyed// me dang mnyam pa lte bar gnas// zas kyis lus gso dngas snyigs 'byed// log n+da pho mtshan nang kun bskyed// thur du sel ba
142b6(pha): gsang bar gnas// las su 'og sgo 'byin sdom byed// log na smad kyi nAd rnams skyed// de rnams a u ri li yi// rnam par rtsa yi nang na gnas// dbu
142b7(pha): ma las skyes yan lag rlung // rgyu ma mchin pa glo la gnas// gzugs ni bzang ngan 'bring gsum ston// log na mig gi skyon rnams 'ong // glo ba sna yi dri
143a1(pha): ni rab 'bring ston// log na sna yind kun bskyed// rab tu rgyu ba lha sbyin ga nas// lce la ro ni rab 'bring ston// log na kha yi nad rnams
143a2(pha): 'byung // yang dgra rgyu ba gzhu la gnas// reg gi bya ba rab 'bring ston// log na pags pa'i nad rnams ston// rnam shes 'byung lnga'i dngas ma ste// chu'i dag
143a3(pha): gzugs mthong a yaM dbyibs// nam mkha'i sgra thob yi ge a// sa yes tri tshor yi ge I// ma rlung ro myong yi ge a ra// chu rlung reg myong yi ge i// phyi ru
143a4(pha): sna byed rlung yin no// rlung bcu de dag phyogs gcig tu// lus la 'byung 'jug gnas gsum las// 'byung 'jug phyi nang g.yas g.yon gyis// g.yos
143a5(pha): rlo ma thabs kyi rlung // rtsub cing thung la phyi ru 'byung // pho rlung dpa' bo'i rang bzhin te// dbang du ma 'dus nyon mongs dang // sdug bsngal 'chi rkyen 'byung ba
143a6(pha): yin// g.yon pa rkyang ma shes rab rlung // 'jam la ring ba nang du 'jug/ mo rlung dpa' mo'i rang bzhin te// bde dang dngos grub 'byung ba dang // nang du
143a7(pha): 'phel na 'chi med byung // g.yas pa 'phel na nyon mongs rgyu// g.yon pa 'phel ba ye shes te// sems can rlung rnams phyir 'bud cing // byang chub
143b1(pha): sems dpa' nang du 'dzin// yon tan skye ba de yi gnad// gnyis mnyam rgyu ba ma ning ste// dbu mar gnas pas gzung 'dzin grol// bcom ldan rdo rje'i skyil
143b2(pha): krung la// mnyam par 'jog pa de yi gnad// 'byung 'jug med pa phyi nang du// mnyam gnas dbu mar rlung chud pas// rtog tshogs gnyis snang rang sar grol//
143b3(pha): ye shes snang bar lam me 'bar// phyi nang rlung gsum rgyu ba ni// lo zla zhag dang dus tshod du// g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i 'pho ba ni// dbyar dgun zla stod zla smad dang /
143b4(pha): nyin mtshan snga dro phyi dro dang // srod dang tho radras ro rkyang gnyis// rlo mos 'pho zhing rgyu ba la// 'byung ba lnga yi rlung rgyu ste// chu rlung sna stengs sa rlung 'og/ me rlung
143b5(pha): g.yas rlung ni g.yon// nam mkha'i rlung ni dbus na rgyu// rna yi rga la brten pa rgyu// 'bru lnga'i rlung la brtan nas su// phyi nang rten 'brel thams cad 'char//
143b6(pha): nad med dar ba' lu sa dag la// rlung gi grangs ni zhag re la// nyi bra chig stong drug ba rgya rgyu'o// phra ba'i rlung ni grangs la sa 'das// rtsa re nang du rlung re gru ba/
143b7(pha): khang pa'i nang gi du ba bzhin// rtsa yi dbyibs dang kha dog tu// rlung gi dbyibs dang kha dog gnas// 'byung 'jug gnas gsum kun la yod// khyad par phugs
144a1(pha): kyi sel kha bzhin// ro rkyang gnyis la dbugs kyi rgyu// 'byin 'jug las kun de yis byed// skyon yon rtsa ba de nyid yin// rkyen gyis bsgyur
144a2(pha): ba sna tshogs 'byung // gnad du chud pa gnas pa'i rlung // dbu ma chos nyid dang du grol// mnyam pa'i rlung ni chos nyid la// rgyan gyi rtsa dang rlung 'khrugs pas/
144a3(pha): nyon mongs dug lnga rang kha shor// rgyud lnga'i las la 'gro rnams 'khor// mA rig las rlung ma dag na// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan mu mtha' med// rlung gsum dbu mar
144a4(pha): chud pa na// dug gsum las dang nyon mongs grol// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis skad pa yi// rtsa mdud yi ge'i gzugs can zhig/ rigs drug sa bon de ru
144a5(pha): grol/ ye nas rgyal ba'i sa bon du// yod la ye shes rlung du gyur// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du grol// rlung zhes bya ba
144a6(pha): las kun byed// 'khor ba skye nas mya ngan 'das// rlung gi ye shes rang rtsal yin// ma rig pa las las kyi rlung // gnas lugs ma shes 'khrul pa la// rang bzhin shes
144a7(pha): pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ 'gyu byed rtog pa rlung gi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
144b1(pha): pa'o// / kun gzhi ma rig rnam shes kyi// g.yo byed yid dang pha ma yi// bde ba'i dngas ma dkar dmar gnyis// dbyer med 'dres pas srog
144b2(pha): gi rtsa/ a bshad dbyibs can chags pa'i nang // srog rlung A yi dbyibs su 'byung // byang chub sems kyi thig le de// 'od kyi gong bu bzhin du chags// de las skyod byed
144b3(pha): rlung gis 'phel// pha yi dngas ma rus pa'i rgyu// dbu ma'i yar sna thig le 'od// haM gi dbyibs can zla bar chags// ma yi dngas ma sha yi rgyu// 'od kyi thig le a yi
144b4(pha): dbyibs// mar sna nyi ma drod can chags// de gnyis cha snyoms nus pa dang // snying khar gnas pa'i ye shes gsum// dbyer med gcig pas byang chub sems// g.yasaH/
144b5(pha): g.yon ro rkyang gnyis kyi nang // A le kA li'i mdud pa can// thig le nyi zla'i 'od can gnas// dngas mashel gyi snying po 'dra// de ltar dngas ma'i thig le gsum// dkar
144b6(pha): dmar kun d+ha'i rang bzhin la// bde gsal mi rtog yon tan skye// snyigs ma rlung mkhris bad ka na gsum// dug gsum thams cad skyed par byed// 'byung ba sems kyi/
144b7(pha): dngas ma lnga// 'khor lo lnga la yi ge'i dbyibs// yar lta rgyal ba'i sa bon la// mar lta rigs drug sa bon du// dngas snyigs gnyis kyi rnam par gnas// rtsa ni gar
145a1(pha): yod rlung gis khyag/ rlung ni gar gnas thig le ni// til dang til mar bzhin du khyab// rlung sems mkha' dang mnyam pa las// snying po gaH
145a2(pha): tu 'dus pa'i gnad// theg le zhes ni brjod pa yin// kun rdzob rgyu yi thig le rnams// sems can las kyi rlung gi bskyed// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi lam la shor//
145a3(pha): rgyud lnga'i rtsa la rigs drug gi/ sa bon thig le rnams g.yos nas// rlung sems ro rkyang gnyis po nas// phyir 'phros rigs drug snang ba 'char// nang dus rmi lam
145a4(pha): rags drug rmi// de yi bag chags par do sad// rgyun du ma rig 'khrul 'khor la// zad med 'khyam pa de yi gnad// nyams na 'byung 'khrugs nad rnams dang //
145a5(pha): 'khrul rtog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung // lam gnas rnal 'byor pA yi dus// rlung sems ma bcos gnas lugs la// mnyam pa nyid du gnad bsnun pas//
145a6(pha): rlung sems thig le'i dngas snyigs 'byed// snyigs ma 'khor ba'i sa bon gyi// thig le yi ge'i gzugs can grol// yang lta rgyal ba'i sa bon gyi// thig le 'phel
145a7(pha): bas phyi rol gyi// gnang ba chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// sku dang zhing khams snang bar 'char// rmi lam de'i bag chags 'char//
145b1(pha): der 'dzin shes pa dag tsan// sku lnga ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// chos dbyings ye shes snying po yi// lus ngag yid gsum dbyer med pa'i// don dam thig le spros dang
145b2(pha): bral// sems nyid lhan cig skyes pa ste// gzhi ni chos sku'i ngo bos stong // lam ni longs sku'i rang bzhin gsal// 'bras bu sprul sku 'gag pa med// thams
145b3(pha): cad rang gi ngo bo nyid// bde ba chen po'i ye shes te// thugs kyi rdo rje mngon du 'gyur// nyag gcig glong na thams cad gsal// 'gyur med 'dus ma byas pa'i sku// /
145b4(pha): rnam par mi rtog lhun grub rdzogs// rdo rje lus la brten nas su// byang chub mngon du bya ba'i phyir// 'dod cing srid pa'i blo spangs la// bcud len gyis ni lus zungs/
145b5(pha): bskyed/ kha zas kun la sbyin sreg bya// rtswa gsum me'i lha'i zhal gsum nang // log pa dgang gzar blug gzar gyis// dug gsum bsreg rdzas dam rdzas 'bul//
145b6(pha): bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lha la mchod// pho bar rlung phul bad kan bzhu// mkhris pas mdog bsgyur me mnyam gyis// dngas snyigs phye nas snyigs ma rnams// pho
145b7(pha): bar lhung nas zur ser 'phel// dngas ma mchin pa'i rtsal zhugs// dang po bad kan de nas khrag/ sha tshil rus pa rkang mar dang // thig le bdun gyis lus stobs

146a2(pha): blang ba'i thabs// rang lus gnad kyi 'khrul 'khor bcu na// dug gsum rtog pa mngon du gsal// steng 'og kha sbyar rlung cig gi// lte ba'i rdo rje me spar la//
146a3(pha): dug lnga sreg pa'i ye shes 'bar// 'bar 'dzag 'od kyi thabs shes kyi// a haM yab yum snyoms 'jug pas// lhan skyes bde chen he ru ka// phyi nang lha tshogs
146a4(pha): bdud rtsis mnyes// byin rlabs me dpung phyogs bcur spros// snod bcud gzung 'dzin bag chags sbyangs// gtum mo ma la dbang byas pas// rtsa grol rlung //

146a6(pha): 'char/ rang bzhin med pa'i mi rtog pa// rnal 'byor blo la gsal bar 'gyur// yang zhing mdog bzang stobs dang ldan// gzhan lus bud med bde ba can// tha
146a7(pha): mal ma yin gsang bdag la// dka' ba ni don gyi ngo sprod blangs// lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i ro// gnyis med ye shes dbu mar blangs// chags dang chags bral rnam spun
146b1(pha): pabapa'i// 'dzag med tshul khrims gang 'dzin pa'i// bslab gsum yon tan rgyan gyis mdzes// ya ra ngo'i zla bzhin yon tan 'phel// sum cu rtsa gAnyis mtshan ldan pa'i//

146b3(pha): phyag rgya chen por don 'di 'dus// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyu chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ bkod pa byang chub sems kyi thig le'i gan sa lugs

146b6(pha): nyid mkha' la sems kyi sprin// dbyings dang rig pa'i rang dwang sa las// byung ba'i rang snang 'byung ba lnga// snod bcud phyi nang rang 'byung ni// dper na tsAn dan sdong po la//
146b7(pha): snying po shun pa lhan cig skyes// rnam pa tha dad don gcig bzhin// snod kyis 'dzin rtog bstan pa yi// phyi yi 'byung ba lnga po yang // rnam shes gcig gis bsdus pa/
147a1(pha): yin// phyi nang gnyi snga po lhan cig skyes// bcud med snod ni ma yod la// snod med bcud na ma byung ni// snod bcud gnyis po tha dad du// skad cig
147a2(pha): tsam yang 'du 'bral med// dang por lhan cig sems las skyes// bar du rnam shes tshogs pa cig/ mthar ni so so 'gag pa med// dus gsum dus med lhan

150a1(pha): bsnyen nyid du 'gyur// bcu gnyis sa yi 'bras bu thob// ngag la rgyu la pa'i gsung rdo rje// smin byed grags stong sngags kyi bcud// rnam
150a2(pha): rtog nad sel bdud rtse sman// gsang ba gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas// dge tshul nyid du bcu gsum pa'i// 'khor lo tshogs chen yon tan thob// sems can
150a3(pha): rgyal ba'i thugs rdo rje// gzung 'dzin bag chags dag pa yis// bde stong ye shes chos nyid mkha'// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi// gsum pa shes rab ye
150a4(pha): shes bskur// 'dod chags dag pa dge slong mchog/ bcu bzhi bde ba chen po thob// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// gnyis su med pa'i ngo sprod mchog
150a5(pha): bzhi pa tshig dbang rin chen bskur// sgo gsum dag pa'i sku gsung thugs// phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor bas// ban+d+ha lnga rdo rje 'chang thob cing // mnyam sbyor sgom
150a6(pha): pa'i mchog ldan pa'i// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba'i// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// lugs mkhan mkhas
150a7(pha): pas blugs pa yi// gsar gyi seng ge 'dam pa'i sbubs// 'dam pa ma bsal mi mngon bzhin// bde gshegs snying pos khyab pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje de//
150b1(pha): dbang gi sgrib pa ma bsal na// ye shes sngon dang mi rtogs pas// ma rig 'khrul pas 'khor bar 'khyams// thar lam bral bas bde ba 'gags// 'ga' zhig theg chen
150b2(pha): lam zhugs kyang // rab rab mig ni sgrub pa la// mig mkhan mkhas pas ma bsal na// don med gzugs brnyan mang mthong yang // mngon sum snang bar mi nus bzhin
150b3(pha): rang 'dod blo yi ting 'dzin gyis// mtshan ma rtag la zhen pa yi// sa lam yon tan mthong gyur kyang // rang rig mngon du ma gyur pas// bskal par lam du 'khrul pas
150b4(pha): bsgribs// 'khrul pa bsal na sngon sangs rgya// sna bcu la gnas sems dpa' yang // rigs pa rdo rje dbyings su grol// bskal par lam du 'khrul pas
150b5(pha): bsgribs// bgrod par byed pa'i lam chen kun// skad cig nyid kyis rtogs lags kyis// rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di// bla ma mnyes pas tshogs lam bgrod
150b6(pha): byin rlabs zhugs pa sbyor lam de// dag snang 'byongs pas mthong lam 'char// dbang bskur thob pa sgom pa'i lam// bskyed rim mthar phyin che gcig gis//
150b7(pha): rdzogs pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob// gang zhig dbang rnams ma thob cing // slob dpon mnyes par ma byas pa'i// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa kun// dngos grub ma
151a1(pha): cing yon tan med// dpon slob gnyis ku nyams pas // thung du smras te ngan song ltung // dbang mad dug can rjod can la// da dru da/
151a2(pha): kakArlag par 'gyur// gang zhig rdul chen mthong ba tsam// ma rig srib pa'i tshogs rnams 'ad// yon tan gnyis pa thob byed na// dbang 'askur rdzob pa smras ci dgas/
151a3(pha): rang gi rnga rje'i don mthong bas// dus gasnum spangs rgyas zhal mthong yin// mnya mas tshe gcig phyir ma lda// skyon spangs dran song myur du thogs// gang gi lus
151a4(pha): blangs kyibs rgyur 'gyur// 'o ma mAr gyi rgyu yin yang // ma bsrubs bar du mar mi 'byung // srubs pas mar du 'byung ba bzhin// sems can sangs rgya
151a5(pha): kyang / prA bsgoms bar du sangs mir+b+ha// bsgom pa'i sngon du 'gro ba la// dbang gi chos sgo ma sbyin// bsgom mi shes te dbus mnga'adra// bsgom par 'dzin
151a6(pha): kyang don mi mthong // dbang med pa la dngos grub med// bye ma btsir ba'i mar dang mtshungs// mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg gam// rmongs pa phub ma brdung ba 'dra/
151a7(pha): dbang thab thun mong mchog gnyis kyi// rang rig ye shes yon tan thob// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas// dbang bskur thob dang mtshungs pa'o// rang nyid mngon
151b1(pha): ma byas pa'i// mtshan nyid mi ldan slob dpon gyis// cho ga la sogs byas gyur kyang // slob ma gus pas ma blangs na// mchog gi dbang ni mi thob ste// thun
151b2(pha): mong yon tan 'byung ba srid// sngags kyis lam du de mi 'gro// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis// cho ga la sogs ma byas kyang // gang gis mos gus yod pa
151b3(pha): des// de yi yon tan thob par 'gyur// mos gus gang yod rgyal ba mnyes// gsol ba gang btab de dron thob// rgyal ba'i sras po phyir mi ldog/ mkhan po tshad
151b4(pha): dang mi ldan zhing // rdzas dang 'dzin cho ga 'khrul// len pa gus pa med pa dang // dam la mi gnas phyin ci log/ bskur dang ma bskor rjes med mtshungs// bum
151b5(pha): chu'i shA la bskur gyur kyang // de yi sgrib pa dag me 'gyur// dbang rdzas ri tsam spungs gyur kyang // de la yon tan rdul tsam med// zhabs med snod du chu blug
151b6(pha): 'dra// skal bar mi ldan dman pa'i rigs// dpon slob gnyis ka nyams par gyur// sngags pa mkhas shing don ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor bdag po tshad ldan
151b7(pha): pas// slob bu rgyud dag gang rten pa// brdal dang brtags ni bsten pa tsam// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thugs rgyud ye shes rtog pa 'phos//
152a1(pha): rig pa tsam gyi rang dbang thob// 'di ni dbang mchog rgyal po yin// dge sdig spang blang rang don byed// 'jig rten lha yi theg pa las// thar
152a2(pha): 'dod bden bzhi'i sgo nas su// nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas// thun mong skyabs 'gro nas brtsams nas// so so thar pa rigs brgyad kyis// rang don tshul
152a3(pha): khrims bsrungs pa yis// slab pa'i gzhi rnams brtan byas la// bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas su// rnal 'byor spyod pa dbu ma'i don// theg pa chen po'i sgor
152a4(pha): zhugs nas// byang chub sems gnyis gzhan don spyod// bden pa dbyer med phyag bya yi// sngags kyi don la 'jug 'dod pa// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs//
152a5(pha): rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang // ma rig sel phyir rig sngags ni// phyi pa pha rol phyin pa'i sngags// lam la ma yengs gzungs sngag te// nang gi
152a6(pha): rgyud la 'jug pa'i sngags// rang rig ye shes bde chen po// tshe 'di nyid la thob byed pas// blo chung theg pa da man rnams dang // phyin cig log par lta ba yi//
152a7(pha): bdud la gsang phyir gsang sngags zhes// sde snod rgyud sde thams cad kun// gtan la phebs par byed pa yi// snying po ye shes mchog gi don// ma nor chos la
152b1(pha): 'jug 'dod pa// bla ma med pa'i grong rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba byung sa med// thog ma'i sangs rgyas bla ma yin// bla ma rang byung sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas thams
152b2(pha): cad 'dus pa'i sku// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid// dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin te// chos sku'i ngang na longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs gzugs kyis skur byon
152b3(pha): nas/ gang la gang 'du la 'gro don mdzad// khyad par lha mi'i 'jig rten du// rdo rje 'dzin pa mi yi gzugs// tha mal gzugs 'dra'i slob dpon 'byon// gsang
152b4(pha): ba sngags las byung ba yi// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os// phyag byar 'os pa bla ma
152b5(pha): rab// zhi zhing dul mi cha byad can// mnyam pa nyid du sems bskyed pas// sems can kun la mi 'dzegs sbyin// ye shes can gyis shes bya rtogs// stong nyid
152b6(pha): snying rje'i bdag nyid can// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i las la mkhas// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba'i// gsang
152b7(pha): sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// de nyid kun gyi slob dpon 'gyur// bla ma las ni ma byung ba'i// chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin pas// bla ma'i drung du sems thag
153a1(pha): chod// bla ma la gus med gyur na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// de bas gus pa thams cad kyis// bla ma'i sku gsung thugs mnyes
153a2(pha): bya/ mos gus gang yod rgyal ba'i sras// gnyug ma'i lhan skyes ye shes 'char// bla ma sangs rgyas gang bsgrub pa// de nyid mos gus stobs kyis 'gyur// bla ma
153a3(pha): dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso// bdag nyid chen po'i lha tshogs yin// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kun// thams cad bla ma mchog las 'byung // dgos 'dod 'byung
153a4(pha): ba rin po che// grang gis 'brel pa don dang ldan// bla ma'i sku 'am 'dra 'bag la// mchod cing bstod pa'i bsod nams ni// tshad du med cing bgrang mi nus// sku
153a5(pha): mthong tsam gyis sdig pa 'dag/ gsung thos pas ni yon tan skye// thugs mnyes pas ni gcig tu 'dres// gnyis med ye shes sangs rgyas na// bskal pa bye
153a6(pha): bar rnyed dka' ba// skad cig nyid la thob par 'gyur// thams cad bla ma mchog las byung // bla ma kun mkhyen sangs rgyas yin// bla ma med pa'i lam mchog ni//
153a7(pha): sngon du ma byung phyis mi 'byung // skye ba 'dzin pa med pa yi// gru yis chab la na la mi nus// de bzhin 'khar ba'i sdug bsngal las// tha ma med na mthar mi nus//
153b1(pha): gsang sngags 'bras bu myur ba dang // 'chug med sngon du 'gyur ba yang // lam mchog bla ma'i mos gus byung // de phyir gus pas 'jug par bya// slob dpon
153b2(pha): gsum la dge slong mchog/ 'bring ni dge tshul nyid du brjod// khyim na gnas pa tha ma ste// yang dag don ni ma rtogs pa'i// sa thob man chad khyim pas ni//
153b3(pha): rmongs pas rdo rje 'dzin ma yong// rtsod ldan dus kyi tha ma la// slob dpon skyon dang yon tan 'dres// dge la spyod byed yon tan dag/ shas cher gyur na rnam
153b4(pha): par bzung // log shes chen spang bar bya// skyon can slob dpon brten byas pas// nyes pa du mas spags par gyur// 'gro kun bde gshegs snying po
153b5(pha): can// 'khor ba 'di la blo log nas// gang zhig dad pas 'jug byed na// rigs ni ma nges gang yang rung // rgyal rigs rje rigs dmangs rigs dang //
153b6(pha): gdal pa rigs ngan bud med dang // mtshams med lnga sogs sdig can yang // chos 'di lA ni zhugs gyur na// bskal pa'i mun nag chen po kun// skad
153b7(pha): cig sgron mes sel ba bzhin// las kyi sgrib pa kun dag nas// yon tan ye shes thob pa'i snod// ma gyur gang yang med pa las// khyad par 'jig rten
154a1(pha): chos dang bral// dad pa che zhing brtson 'grus ldan// dul zhing gus pas slob dpon khur// 'phral 'dzum khog yangs bsam pa bzang /
154a2(pha): dam tshig gtsang zhing khrel dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing snying rje che// nor dang srog la 'phangs med gtong // byang chub don gnyer slob bu la// chos kun dbang
154a3(pha): thob snod dang ldan// yon tan yid bzhin nor bus glang // sangs rgyas ye shes rgyun mi 'chad// snod du ma rung skal chad ni// tshe 'di mi spong chags sdang che// dad
154a4(pha): pa chung la log lha che// gus med bla ma'i bka' ma bsgrub// khrel med thabs kyis chos 'dod cing // rna bar thos nas gzhan la sgrog/ lag na thob nas zong du
154a5(pha): tshe// don la mi bsgom tshig la re// dam tshig mi gtsang rdzun po che// dam med man ngag nang tshong byed// gzhogs ngoms byed cing rang che 'byin// chos thob slob
154a6(pha): dpon rgyang du bsring // 'brel pa med rdzus gzhan la 'dud// bzhed pa mtho ris thar pa bzhed// 'gro ba mnar med dmyal bar 'gro// de 'dra'i snod ngan skal med
154a7(pha): la/ rgyal srid gter yang chos ma sbyin// gang zhig gus med chos la dred// spyod pa bag med ting 'dzin g.yal// sngags pa chang gi myos gyur pa// de la gags ni
154b1(pha): mang po 'byung // 'dod la dga' zhing 'khrigs la sred// rgod cing glu len 'dug mi tshugs// 'thab mo'i las brtson rnam par 'phrul// spyod cing bka' bas 'chol bar
154b2(pha): byed/ nyams pas du 'bod gnas su 'gro// gsang sngags snod ma ni de la ni// mkha' 'gro khros pas nad rnams mang // 'jigs pa'i mya ngan 'tshe ba 'ong // dngos
154b3(pha): grub bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med// sdig can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur// grogs po dag la grib kyis chod// bdud de nyid la 'dug de nyid// dug la sman gyis sel ba
154b4(pha): ste/ sman gyi nad la bya thabs med// dug lo bdud rtsir sngags kyis bsgyur// sngags pa myos pa'i nyes pa ni// bdag nyid chen po lha bral bas// sangs rgyas kun
154b5(pha): gyis bcos thabs medo// sngags pa 'di dag spang ba ni// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis bshad// gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog ni// dur khrod gnas su
154b6(pha): dngos grub nye// bas mtha' dgon par ting 'dzin 'phel// rgyal po'i pho brang bar chad med// gtsug lag khang skor 'gro don che// bzhi mdo rnams na yo byad tshogs// mchod
154b7(pha): rten gnas su kun gyis bkur// de ru phyi nang gsang gsum gyis// 'tshams kyi khang pa chen po bya// srung ba rdo rje'i rabs bskor// yang na mi med grong khyer ram//
155a1(pha): dur khrod rI yI bya skyibs tshogs// brda' ba khyen te de rnams su// tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyad par bya// yang ngo mar ngo'i dus bzangs la//
155a2(pha): mkha' 'gro ma rnams dka' bya'i sbyi// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor tshogs kyis 'thob par 'gyur// bza' min bza' min btung min la// rnam
155a3(pha): rtog nyid du mi bya ste// sngags pa ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// chang ni bdud rtsir btung byas te// sha na mkhas pas sdig med bza'// sems can de'i dbang du 'gyur/
155a4(pha): skrod dang skrod min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog med pa'i chos nyid rdzol// zad med bde ba'i mchod sprin la// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yis// mkha' 'grom
155a5(pha): rnams 'du bar 'gyur// gang gi dngos grub len pa la// gsang ba'i skad kyis ma bsgrags nas// de ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// gsang sngags gsang bas 'grub
155a6(pha): ba'i phyir// dben pa'i gnas su 'khor lo bskor// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yi// bdag nyid he ru ka yis ni// ngag gi grun sngags su bzlas// lus kyi spyod pa
155a7(pha): phyag rgya gar// glu gar dgyes pa'i mchod pa ni// rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson par bya// dkyil 'khar chen po'i lha tshogs kyi// lhag ma'i bdud rtsis kun tshim bya//
155b1(pha): 'byung po rnams la gtor ma gtang // chags pa med par yongs su bsngo// rnal 'byor sems dge ldan pa de// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub kun// bsgrub pa nam dran
155b2(pha): dus na bzang // rgyun chad med pa bzang ba'i mchog/ khyad par lo b+ha rjes grangs kun// yon tan 'phel 'dod bstod du bzang // smad du bsgrib pa zad 'dod bzang // khyud
155b3(pha): par nyi ma rgas pa na// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'tshogs pa yin// phyi rol de bzhin nang du yang // lha rnams 'du bar 'gyur ba ste// byin rlabs dngos grub mtshan ma chi//
155b4(pha): nam langs pa na lha yang dgyes// rnal 'byor lus sems bde nyams 'gag/ nyin mo phyi yi bya ba ni// khrus dang gtsang sbrul sogs spyod// mtshan mo nang gi rnal
155b5(pha): 'byor bskyang // dngos grub myur du thob pa yin// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang phyag mtshan dang // bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod yon dang // dbang rdzas mkho ba'i yo byad rnams
155b6(pha): ji ltar bsgrub bzhin tshogs par bya// yo byad ma 'dzom bsgrub pa yi// dngos grub nyams shing bar chad 'byung // rdzas rnamasna tshogs pa dam tshig gnad// pha rol
155b7(pha): dbang du de mi 'gyur// sngags kyi dngos grub don nyer 'grub// tshe rigs bzang zhing khrel dang ldan// dad pa brtan cing ngang rgyud ring // kha na mtho'i spyod pa bral//
156a1(pha): brtson 'grus che zhing rtog pa mthun// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i chos brgyad bral// byang chub thar pa chubs sgom// bde ba 'dod phyir sdug bsngal
156a2(pha): nus/ chos dang yo byad rdzas dang ldan// dpa' brtul gdeng che rig pa ldan// bla ma khong gi snying bzhin 'dzin// grogs pos mig gi 'bras ltar btso// dam
156a3(pha): tshig srog dang sngos nas srung // blo che shes rab namu mkha' 'dra// bla ma gcig cing dam tshig gcig/ yang na rang gis dbang bskur ba'i// rdo rje'i bu dang bu
156a4(pha): mo'i rigs// 'khor ba'i chos la 'brel chad pa'i// byang chub don du gnyer ba yi// mang po'i tshogs su spyod lam mkhas// gsang sngags spyod dus rnam
156a5(pha): rtog bral// gcig por 'dug na 'bral mi phod// bla ma thod bzhin bkur ba yis// chos bzhin spyod pa grogs kyi mchog/ rang rgyud ngan la gzhan rgyud bsreg
156a6(pha): ngo tsha chung la log lta che// tshe 'di mi spong nor la sred// phrag dog che zhing spun la 'khu// bla ma khA gsag g.yo sgyus brten// chos spyod khe dang grags pa re//
156a7(pha): snying rus chung la 'dod chags che// dgon par mi gnas grong la dga'// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di 'dod// blo dman spyad pa skyen kha 'brim// dam tshig mi
156b1(pha): bsrung g.yo sgyu 'cha'// stobs chung nor med na tsha mod// le lo the tshom g.yeng ba che// rgyud gyong tshod yod brnyas pa che// grogs po ngan pa thabs kyis spang /
156b2(pha): grogs ngan bdud kyi nang byan yin// dngos grub mi thob bar chad 'khyer// gnyis ka rig zar chu 'bab pazhin// gcig gis gcig phul ngan song lhung // sangs rgyas
156b3(pha): bstan pa'i ru drar 'gyur// gsang sngags rigs pa'i lha yin pas// snang srid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya chen po rab rtogs pas// lha dang gnyis med gyur pa
156b4(pha): yin// rang snang lha yi dkyil 'khor du// dran pas bya ni rlabs gsal thebs pa// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yin// lha dang rang gnyis dam tshig dang // ye shes gnyis
156b5(pha): kyi spro bsdu yis// rtsa ba nya ba'i snying po la// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi// rtags la thug par bzlas pa ni// gang zag tha ma'i bzlas pa yis// lha dang nyer bar
156b6(pha): gnyen pa yin// sems can thams cad rgyud gcig cing // sangs rgyas dgongs pa gcig pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas gcig gi bsgoms bzlas la// yi ge gsum gyis
156b7(pha): mgo drangs pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnyen po ru// chu zla gcig ni dag gyur na// chu zla thams cad dag pa bzhin// rang gis yi dam gang mos kyi// bsnyen pa rdzogs na
157a1(pha): 'phrin las kyis// gang byed bsnyen par bsgyur ba chog/ 'khor lo'i bdag po bzlas pa 'bum// gcig bzlas kun tu shes par bya// dkyil 'khor can
157a2(pha): gyi de bzhin khri// las kyis bsgyur ba stong phrag re// tha mas brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsnyen// lha dang gnyis med gyur tsam na// gsang sngags bsnyen pa rdzogs rtags yin//
157a3(pha): mchog ni rang rig ye shes lha// thun mong dngos grub 'byung ba// sngon du lha dang ma bsnyen par// phyi nas dngos grub mi 'byung bas// gsang sngags zlas mchog sngon
157a4(pha): du gces// phyi nas par chad mi 'byung phyir// mkhas pas sa gzhi legs brtags la// dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gang byed du// sa bdag rnams la sa bslangs la//
157a5(pha): skyon med 'dzin ma rnam par sbyangs// gang gi skyon dang 'tshams pa yi// stegs bu ma brdal legs su na// hUM hU bsnyen pa byas nas ni// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab tu
157a6(pha): bsgom// phyogs skyong 'byung po'i gdon rnams la// oM a hU/ a kha ro mu kha sarba d+harma Na na// Ad+ya nud pa na na tA da swA hA/ zhes pas spyi ru gtor ma ga tang // bar
157a7(pha): chad med pa'i bka' bsgo bya// shing btsir me spar lha ba skyed la// o ag ne me dza la ra shan ting ku ru swA hA/ rdzas dbul sdig sgrib bag tshogs sbyangs// 'phrin las
157b1(pha): 'dod gsol dmigs pas bsgyur// sbyin sreg las la su brtson pa// tshogs rdzogs sgrib dag bar chad sel// sbyin sreg me yi mchod pa 'dis// lha dgyes rab la
157b2(pha): dngos grub 'byung // 'phrin las bzhi po 'grub pa 'di// gsang ba nang gi pU tsa'o// gong gi slob ma dbang bskur ba// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs la ni// rdul gcig
157b3(pha): steng nas mkha'i bar// che chung blo dang gang 'tsham par// snang sred snod ni gzhal yas khang // srid pa bcud ni lha'i 'khor// bdag nyid 'khor lo'i bdag po ru// ye nas
157b4(pha): lhun gyis grub pa'i dpal// rab kyis rtogs shing 'bring gis bsgom// thams ma rig rmongs pa la// mtshon byed phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nad
157b5(pha): du ni/ da kyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs// gang brag blo dang bu snun pa yi// tshad ni sor ba zhi ma bro gang dang // gru bzhi 'dom gang rgyang grag sa nas// dpag tshad la sogs
157b6(pha): gang 'thad bya// shes rab ldan pa'i bu pho mos// gsar pa legs par bkal ba yi// srad bu tshon gyis kha do ga bsgyur// ye shes dgug bstim rgyal ba rnams//
157b7(pha): mkha' nas byin brlabs thig btab pas// sa la dmigs la bar bya// de nas thabs dang shes rab kyis// srad bu lnga ldan chad med pas// sa la las kyis thig
158a1(pha): btab nas// gzhal yas khang gi rmang bting ngo // 'di la lha rnams skyob par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni bya bar byed// rmongs pa rnams la
158a2(pha): bstan pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dam pa tshon la// rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma dang // yang na 'bru 'am sa la ni// kha dog lnga 'am nyi shu yIs// bsgyur ba'i tshon ni dri med la// rgyal
158a3(pha): ba'i byin brlabs yang shes bzhug/ smra dang yo dang 'khyogs med par// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi sgo bzhi gzi brjid can// dong shal do shal phyed pa
158a4(pha): dang / 'phel ba mda' yab snam bu dang // ka ba brgyad la sogs pa yi// rta babs mu khyud chos 'khor gdugs// dkyil 'khor dbus 'gyur mtha' mi 'gyur//
158a5(pha): dbus su 'khor lo'i bdag pos shes// pad+ma'i 'khor lo 'od zer dang // ling tshe dra mig sna tshogs 'byung // bla bre gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // dar dpyangs tshon
158a6(pha): dra ba yis// rgyal po'i pho brang brgyan par bya// bgeg dang bzlog phyir me long dang // mda' dang ral gri phur pa dang // me tog rin chen 'phreng ba dang // bdug pa mar
158a7(pha): me lha bshos dri// bum pa la sogs mdzes par brgyan// de la lha rnams mchod par 'gyur// bum pa lha yi grangs dang mnyam// yang na gnyis la bsdus kyang rung //
158b1(pha): gcig ni las kyi bum par bsham// slob ma 'jug pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ rnam par rgyal ba bgegs bskrad pa// rin chen sna lngas yongs su gang // mgrin par gos
158b2(pha): kyis dkris nas su// 'bras bu can gyis legs par brgyan// sku'i phyag mtshan la sogs brgyan// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal steng // bum pa bzhag la ye shes
158b3(pha): pa// dgug bstim mchod bstod bsnyen pa bya// dkyil 'khor gnas su dgod pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom// lha rnams so so gnas su gzhag/ mchod
158b4(pha): bstod bsgren pas dkyil 'khor sgrub// gsol ba 'debs cing dngos grub blang // lung bstan rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen cing bsgrub mchod su brtson na//
158b5(pha): tshogs gnyis myur rdzogs byang chub thob// e ma ngo mtshar rmad po che// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor du// tshogs bsags bag chags sbyangs pa dang // rnal 'byor
158b6(pha): chags nyams bskang ba'i phyir// 'ongs sgrol ba skang bshags mchod par bya// gsol ba gdab cing dngos grub blangs// slob ma khrus bya bgegs bskrad cing //
158b7(pha): gsar pa'i gos gyon rtags pas// sdom pa gsum la rim pa bslab// gsang sngags spyod pa'i dam tshig bshad// bla mas slob ma'i snying la ni// yo shes gzhug
159a1(pha): cing byin gyis brlabs// ma rig sgrib pa bsal don du// slob ma'i gdong ni gos kyis bcing // bla ma lha la gsol ba gdag/ dper na rang
159a2(pha): ge byad bzhin te// ma mthong me long nang ltas gsal// de bzhin rang gi ye shes de// dkyil 'khor mthong bas gsal ba'i phyir// slob ma dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/
159a3(pha): rdul tshon mthong ba tsam gyis ni// ma rig sgrib pa'i tshogs dag nas// rang gi ye shes snang ba thob// nga yi dkyil 'khor 'di mthong nas// yon tan myur du rdzogs
159a4(pha): byed pas// dkyil 'khor 'di ni ma mthong bar// tshul 'di gzhan nas ma smra zhig/ dam med lha la sreg par 'gyur// 'di nas bzung nas dus kun tu// lha dang mi 'bral
159a5(pha): dam chos cig/ de las 'gal na brlag par 'gyur// slob mas khas blangs dam bcas la// dam tshig ye shes mngon du 'gyur// gtsang ma'i gnas ni nyams dga' ga/
159a6(pha): dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs pa yis// yang dag rdzogs pa der sangs rgyas// rang nyid lha ru ma gyur na// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus// slob dpon dkyil 'khor nang du
159a7(pha): bzhugs// lha la lung ni blang bar bya// lha yi gnang ba thob pa dang // slob ma yongs su smin par byed// rang rig ye shes lha sku ru// yod pa ma rig sgrub pa la// phyi nas
159b1(pha): brda yi dbang bskur ba// dper na bum pa'i lha sku de// phyi nang bum pa mthong ba tsam// nang na lha sku shes pa bzhin// bum pa'i dbang ni bskur ba tsam// rang lus lha
159b2(pha): skur shes par 'gyur// de bzhin ngag la bdud rtsi dang // yid la phyag rgya gzugs brnyan dang // sems la ma rtog brda bstan pas// de dang de don rtogs phyir du//
159b3(pha): phyi ni brda yi dbang du bstan// dper na glen pa 'khrul pa la// rang lus bstan pas ming shes te// me long bstan pas yid ches ltar// ma reg rtog can gang zag
159b4(pha): l-i/ mngon sum bstan pas mi rig ste// thabs la brten nas don rtogs phyir// brda yi dbang du bstan pa yin// dang por bum par dkyil 'khor bsgom//
159b5(pha): da ya dbang skur ba dag gis thob// tha ma la sgrub pa dag nas su// rang lus lha ska'i da kyi la 'khor du// ti nge 'dzan gyis bsgo ma shes pa'i// gnyen po'i
159b6(pha): dbang ni thob pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon sku nyid la// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa yin// lha mo klu mo me yi tshogs// shwa rtsa sngo la yid 'ong ma// rdo rje
159b7(pha): rigs kyi bu mo yin// de bzhin dmar ser ldang ba'i mdog/ rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// dkar mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rigs ma bzang mo rnams gzhug/
160a1(pha): yang na ji ltar rig pa yis// brag rtsa bdag khu ba ldan// gsang thub bcu drug lon pa nyid// tshul khrims ldan pas brten la// phyag rgya'i gdong
160a2(pha): yang bcings pa yis// thubs kyi gdong yang de bzhin la// brten pa de las gang byung ba'i// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor bsam// lha tshogs zhu ba'i byang
160a3(pha): chub sems// rdo rje lha yas budad rtse blang // lce stangs gsung gi lha tshogs bsgom// rtog tshogs rang grol mngon sum du// bsgom ma dgos pa don gyi dbang
160a4(pha): lU dang rang gnyis ro snyoms pa'i// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// bdag / med shes rab spang du gad// rang mnyam lha yo ting 'dzin de// phyag rgya chen po'i
160a5(pha): dkyil 'khor du// b+ha ga bde chen bskyed pa'i lha// gzhal yas khang gnang nyid nas// thabs kyi rdo rje ha ru ka/ gnyis med mnyam sbyor sgyu ma'i gzugs// rang
160a6(pha): gzhan cha yi rnam rtog gis// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa'i// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags
160a7(pha): dang chags bral rnam spangs pa'i// rang rig lhan skyes ye shes lha// de nyid 'khor 'das kun gyi srog/ thams cad kun la khyab pa yis// de nyid yul las rnam
160b1(pha): par 'das// skyes bu mngon rab dbang phyug go/ dang po rang nyid dga' ba tsam// tha mal 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dag/ gnyis pa gzhan nyid mchog dga' tsam// gzung
160b2(pha): dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dag/ dga' bral nyid de lhan cig tu// snang srid snod bcud snang ba kun// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du// rang snang nyid la mngon sum du//
160b3(pha): rtog pa don gyi dbang yin no// rang rlig gzhan rig thams cad kun// snang chud gzugs sku rgyal ba'i sku// sgra grags thams cad rgyal ba'i gsung // dran tshad
160b4(pha): rgyal ba'i thugs kyi ni// mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du// rig sbyar rig pa'i ye shes dbang // sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// bskur bas sangs
160b5(pha): rgyas nyid du ni// rtsal rdzogs phyir na rtsal gyi dbang // zhes ni rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang // mthar thug don gyi dbang yin no// thabs shes gnyis med ye shes rgyud//
160b6(pha): phyi nang dbyer med dkyil 'khor du// bdag kyang grol bar bya ba dang // slob ma yongs su smin bya'i phyir// dbang gi cho ga rnam par bshad// dkyil 'khor gsum mam
160b7(pha): bzhi la brten// sman grol dbang gis cho ga yis// rab 'byam chos kyi de nyid don// rtogs phyir thams cad mkhyen dbang bskur// thabs shes ldan pa'i gang zag gis//
161a1(pha): smin byed dbang la brten nas su// rig pa'i ye shes rtog par bya// thug pa rang 'byung kun tu bzang // bstan pa'i bdag po chos kyi sku// 'jam dbyangs
161a2(pha): khams rnams kun la khyab// gsang ba 'dus pa kun byed rgyal// ye shes gsang ba'i dbyings na gsal// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba 'dul// 'khor lo bde mchog bde bar
161a3(pha): gnas// dbang thob nas ni rtogs par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin la rdzogs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dbang gis grol bar byed pa la//
161a4(pha): bye brag rnam pa lnga bshad de// phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob ma smin byed slob dpon dbang // khyad par mchog gi dbang rnams bskur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der
161a5(pha): 'gyur ro// da ma rdzas bdud rtsis nad kun spong // ye shes bdud rtsis nyon mongs 'joms// bdud rtsi dbang gis dngos grub blang // tshe mchog yon tan bla na med// gang
161a6(pha): gris rigs 'dzin sgrub pa la// dbang gi byin rlabasu 'jug pa yAM sa// sgrol ma'i las kyi cho ga yis// dngos grub thob par gdon mi za// 'khor lo drug rdzogs dbang bskur
161a7(pha): yin// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug 'dod yon lnga mchod
161b1(pha): na// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin// longs spyod gzhan rnams smos ci dgos// nyes pa kun byang yon tan thob// dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// bla ma'i
161b2(pha): bka' bzhini rjes su sgrub// snying rje chud ma zos pa yi// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du bya// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i 'phrin las dbang // rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis rdzogs//
161b3(pha): slob dpon ma nyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// gsang sngags sgor zhugs rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// bum pa
161b4(pha): dbu rgyan cod pan dang // 'phreng ba gos dang rgyal mtshan gdugs// phyag ma sa 7za' btung dang // snying po la sogs dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras/
161b5(pha): ngan song 'jigs pa med pa dang // tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// byang chub sems
161b6(pha): bskyed byas nas su// lha dang mi 'bral sdom pa ni// khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin pa yang mi bslang zhing // 'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya// rdzun
161b7(pha): du yang ni mi smra ste// nyes pa'i rtsa ba chang spang zhing // sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// bya ba ma yin thams cad dor// dam pa rnams la rim gro bya//
162a1(pha): rnal 'byor ma rnams thabs kyi mchod// lus ngag yid kyi mi dge spang // dge ldan longs spyod tshogs la spyod// rang snang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la/
162a2(pha): skyes pa bud med la sogs pa'i// sems can rnams kyi gzugs mi smad// thams cad lha dang lha mor lta// sku yi dam tshig rdo rje yin// brlang dang rtsub dang mi snyan pa'i/
162a3(pha): tshig dgra smra bar mi byed cing // grags tshad rgyal ba'i gsung du nyan// rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig yin// rnam rtog rba bsra bcings pa yi// sems can rnams la skyabs pa dang/
162a4(pha): sems kyi rdo rje smad mi bya// thams cad chos nyid rol pa la// rol pa'i ye shes chen po ni// thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje ste// 'da' ka rdo rje gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang /
162a5(pha): khyad par 'phags pa yi// dam tshig slob dpon mi 'da' 'o// dkyil 'khor mu ran sbyang pa yi// las byad mkha' 'gro lhag ma'i mchod// 'byung po thams cad kun
162a6(pha): tshim bya// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa rnams// phyag rgya lnga yis yang dag mchod// bro gar 'dul 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// mched lcam thams cad dgyes par bya//
162a7(pha): glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes par bya// brgyan dang bsgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// skye 'gro thams cad mnyes par byed// bza' btung tshogs kyi
162b1(pha): phyag rgya yis// mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyes par byed// A li kA li phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byed// dga' chen rol mo chen po yi//
162b2(pha): dgyes pa'i rim gro phun tshogs pa// spyod pa kun tu spyod par bya'o// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ smin lam
162b3(pha): dbang gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nyid la// bsgom med bsgoms pa po yang med// lha med sngags
162b4(pha): kyang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas// lha dang sngags ni yang dag gnas// de nyid rtogs pa'i lam du ni// dngul rdo dngul du ma bzhu bar// btul
162b5(pha): yang bzo ni mi nyan bzhin// dbang med bskyed ram bsgom pa kun// don gyi 'bras bu mi 'byung bas// gser dngul bzhu btul byed pa bzhin// dbang gis smin byas bskyed
162b6(pha): rim rung // 'bras bu gtan la 'bebs pa yin// gang zhig lam la 'bad byas kyang // lha dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'bras bu myur du mi thob ste// rgyus med yul
162b7(pha): du 'gro ba bzhin// lam gyi gol sa shin tu mang // stong pa nyid la lta nyes na// shes rab chung ldan phung bar 'gyur// snang srid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// de nyid ma
163a1(pha): rig snod bcud 'khrul// dngos por zhen las 'khor bar 'khyams// rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin// shes dang mtshungs pa'i sems nyid la// bag
163a2(pha): chags skyon gyis mi gos kyang // rnam pa rkyen gyi 'gyur ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rkyen gyi 'khor bar snang // de las bzlog pa'i lam rnams kyis// 'bras bu 'gog pa'i
163a3(pha): bden par snang // rgyu de'i 'bras bu gsang sngags kyis// lam gyi gzung 'dzin kun grol nas// snad bcud mngon zhe na bzlog pa'i phyir// dang po blos byas bskyed rim
163a4(pha): bsgom// bar du ting 'dzin lha ru 'char// mthar thug bskyed du med pa yis// rang snang ye shes lha ru 'gyur// lha nyid sems la sems nyid lha// shal dang 'od gnyis
163a5(pha): gnyis med bzhin// lha dang sems gnyis gnyis su med// gnyis med rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yin// yin kyang de nyid ma rig pa sna// med pa'i ngang las yod pa ru//
163a6(pha): kun rtags phyi'i bskyed ram bsgom// gzhan dbang rkyen des rang lus ni// lha yi sku ru gsal ba yin// de nyid rang rtsal sbyangs pa yis// yongs grub rgyal ba'i sku ru
163a7(pha): 'gyur/ de phyir bskyed rim dran pas gso// gsal bar 'phyongs pa mnyam bzhag yin// rang bzhin shes pas rjes shes yin// mi g.yo gnas ba zhi gnas yin//
163b1(pha): gnas lugs shes pa lhag mthong ngo // dkyil 'khor dam pa sems kyi lta// stong pa'i rdo rje spyan cig ni// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru snang // 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje sems//
163b2(pha): thams cad 'byung bas rin chen 'byung // ci yang 'char bas mtha' yas 'od// thams cad grub pas don yod grub/ dper na chung shel snying po'i 'di// gcig la ma 'gags
163b3(pha): phyogs bcu gsal// de bzhin kun tu bzang po de// phyogs bcur khyab pas gang chen mtsho// gzung 'dzin bral bas chos kyi sku// kun tu snang bas gzugs kyi sku//
163b4(pha): rnam par snang mdzad kun tu zhal// thams cad ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i// spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin yin// kun gzhi'i rnam shes cig nyid la// rang nyid ma dag spyad
163b5(pha): gzhi las// dag pa'i sbyong byed sna tshogs kyis// shin tu rnam dag go rim bzhin// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga dngos// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yin te// kun mkhyen cig/
163b6(pha): gis bsdus pa'i phyir// 'byung ba ldan yul lnga la// rdo rje'i skye mched phyi nang rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'khor 'das gnyis snang sgobs
163b7(pha): te/ gzung 'dzin gnyis snang yab yum mkha'// gnyis med lhan skyes kun gyi bdag/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir//
164a1(pha): gang gang gdul bya'i snang ba bzhin// mang po dang ni gcig dag tu// zhi ba longs spyod rdzogs sku byung // nyon mongs lnga ni rang rgyal ba'i// shin tu
164a2(pha): gtsub cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun bstan// phung po khams rnams bdag nyid
164a3(pha): ltar/ skyes pa bud med thams cad kyang // kha dog rigs ni rnam pa lnga// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing nag pa// rigs lnga'i rtags las byung ba yis// rigs kyi yon
164a4(pha): tan thob par 'gyur// rigs ni rnam pa du ma las// 'gro ba du ma skye ba yang // sems nyid dam pa gcig gi rig/ mi'i rigs su brtag bya ste// dngos de nges par bsgoms/
164a5(pha): pa yis// rang sems mthu yis sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha rnams thams cad gang bsgoms kyang // rigs gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs lnga las ni
164a6(pha): ma 'das te// sku yi lha rnams de bzhin rigs// gsung gi lha rnams pad+ma'i rigs// thugs kyi lha rnams rdo rje'i rigs// yon tan lha rnams rin chen rigs// 'phrin
164a7(pha): las lha rnams kar ma'i rigs// rigs ni lnga po de nyid las// rigs gsum rigs bzhi rigs lnga dang // brgya stong 'bum phrag bye ba sogs// bgrang du med par
164b1(pha): bskyed pa nyid// de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// grangs med rigs las rigs can rnams// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las
164b2(pha): byung / de bzhin nyid du lus cig gis// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed kyi// zhing khams spros pas nam mkha' bzhin// dag pa nyid du ston par byed// de bzhin
164b3(pha): bdag gis lha sku yis// zhing khams thams cad khyab par byed// bdag gi lus kyi chos kyi dbyings// de dang mnyam par rab tu shes// chos dbyings 'gyur ba
164b4(pha): med par rtogs// zhing khams rnam dag du ma dag/ zhing gtsug tu ni ston par byed// stong gsum 'dzam bu'i gling du gcig/ 'dzum glang snying po rdo rje'i gdan//
164b5(pha): mi mjed khams 'di me bdun dang // chu yis zhig kyang lha dang myis// rtag tu rgyu ni mi 'chad par gang // gzhi ni snying pos brgyan pa'i zhing // zhing ni rnam pa du ma
164b6(pha): yis// zhing khams du mas ston par byed// skra yi rtse mo gcig tu yang // zhing khams du ma ston par byed// du ma sgra yi rtse ru 'dus// sgra yi rtse mos nam
164b7(pha): mkha' khengs// 'phra ba ba spu rdul phran tsam// che ba nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam// chos nyid gcig gi rol pa ste// lha rnams thams cad zhi ba'am// yang na khro
165a1(pha): bar bsgom par bya// ras ris dang ni lugs ma gzugs// mang po dag gam gcig kyang rung // zhing khams sna tshogs spro bsdu yi// sangs
165a2(pha): rgyas gar mkhan bsam mi khyab// dkyil 'khor rim pa mang na yang // 'di dag sems kyis rnam 'khrul yin// sems las ma rtog phyi rol na// byed pa gzhan
165a3(pha): gyi sgyu med pas// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// don la 'jug phyir khyab 'jug ces// thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni/
165a4(pha): gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// 'on phul ni nyi shu bzhi// mkha' 'gro 'dru bo'i konas rnams ni// phyi rol yod pa ma yin nas// sum cu rtsa ba gang ltar lags/ ba
165a5(pha): ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// yul zhes bya ba rtswa yin te// mkha' 'gro zhes ni rlung sems la// gnyis su med pa zhing khams kyi// reg pa ye shes lta zhes
165a6(pha): d+d+ho/ s+phu ri ram mgro bo la// dz+wa lan d+hA ra spr-i bos te// u rgyun rna ba gsus pa la// 'gro ta ri ni rna ba g.yon// ra r+thi sar smin 'tshams la// d+he ba ko te mig
165a7(pha): gnyis la'o// nang du thig le dkar por gnas// phyi nang mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i phyir// gnas zhes lus la brjod pa yin// ma la waM ni phrag pa la// nang du dkar cha shas
165b1(pha): che bas/ phyi rol DA ki 'ga' re gnas// nye ba'i gnas zhes brjod pa yin// ka ma ru pa mtshan khung dgod// o de nu ma gnyis la yod// rtsa nang bde ba longs spyod
165b2(pha): pas/ phyi ru gra ki longs spyod cing // kri sha ku ni lte ba'i dbus// ko sa la ni sna yi rtse// a bu ta ni rgyab tshigs la// ku lu ta ne 'ag+hen par gnas// nang du bde bo chu
165b3(pha): la spyod// phyi ru Da ki 'ga' ri spyod// 'ga' re mi gnas nye ba'i zhing // ka ling ka ni kha la dgod// lam pa ka ni mgrin pa'i dbus// tsa ri tra na brang kha ste// b+hi tsa ni
165b4(pha): rkan phugs so// kan rtsi ka ni snying kha ste// rtsa nang thig le dngas snyigs 'dres// mkha' 'gro 'du bas mtshan d+ho'o// ma la bu ri mtshan rtse ste// ka li ka ni gri mongs
165b5(pha): la// rtswa nang thig le drangs ma nye// mkha' 'gro nyer song nye mtshan no// spre ta pu re mtshan ma ste// 'ag+h+ri ha de ba bshang lamra yin// so'ur ta baR+Ya gnyis song //
165b6(pha): gser gling rje ngar gnyis la yod// rang ma d+hu li lce la gnas// ba'i mchod sbyin sna gnyis na// rtsa yi nang du dengs ma 'dra// phyi ru gra kaM 'du ba'o// na ga ra ni sor mo ste//
165b7(pha): kha ri byin pa gnyis la'o// nang du snyegs 'du phyi rol tu// d+ha ki nye bas nye 'du'o// sen d+hu rkang pa'i ngol gnyis la// dngos ma'i bde ba phyir 'phros pas// d+ha gi rgyu byed
166a1(pha): dur khrod do// ku lu ta ne pus mor gnas// ra ma d+hu ru 'og sgo na// mu mu ni ni gzung ba'i 'gram// rtsa nang khams ni gnas tsam las// bde ba mi
166a2(pha): skye gra ki rnams// rgyu ba tsam las mi gnas pas// nye bas dur khrod zhes brjod do// rang lus rgyas pa'i zhing khams la// dngos grub 'dod na 'di ru bsgrub// phyi rol mtshon
166a3(pha): byed brda yi gnas// de ru byang chub 'grub mi 'gyur// rtog pas thun mong 'byung ba srid// brda don gnyis med sems kyi gzugs// rang rig ye shes mkha' 'gro la//
166a4(pha): phyi nas dngos grub re ba kun// sprin med mkha' la char 'dod 'dra// de bas dngos grub rang la sgrubs// phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag yin// gang zag dbang po'i
166a5(pha): blo rigs la// thabs kyis 'dul phyir rgyud sde bzhi// bskyed rim bye brag so sor bstan// kun kyang 'bras bu gcig tu 'dod// rtsol byas rtsol med thabs kyi khyad//
166a6(pha): dang po blo dman gang zag dang // mu stegs rtsod pa spangs pa'i phyir// bde gshegs yum ni phyag rgya sbas// lha rnams thams cad phan tshun dgod// phyag rgya dang
166a7(pha): bcas rin chen rgyan// bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' ni// thams cad sems dpa'i tshul du bsgom// me tog bdug spos phyi nas mchod// lha yang 'go min gar+b+ha/
166b1(pha): nas 'dren// dngos grub dam pa lha la re// khrus dang gtsang sbra spyod pa can// phyi pa zhes su btags pa yin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lha yi sku ru ne /
166b2(pha): pa yis/ dran pa tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis// lha yi sku ru gsal gyur kyang // 'gro ba thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab yum ni phyag mtshan nam// brda yi
166b3(pha): rtags tsam 'dzin pa yi// phyi ru mchod yon lnga 'dzin cing // nang du 'dod yon lnga spyod de// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med bsgom// dngos grub bdag la sgrub pa ni//
166b4(pha): rigs 'dzin nang gi bskyed rim yin// snang stong ye shes chos dbyings mkha'// dam tshig ye shes tshul mi 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med brjor//
166b5(pha): yab yum gnyis med zung 'jug 'byung // lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba la// snang tshad lha yi skur bsgom zhing // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi sha chen sogs// rang byung dam
166b6(pha): rdzas bdud rtsi la// longs spyod zad med bde ba mchod// dngos grub dam pa rang la thob// skal med rnams kyis ma rtogs phyir// gsang sngags lha zhes bstan pa yin//
166b7(pha): gsang sngags gsang zhes bya ba ni// chos la skyon yod ma yin te// blo chung theg dman rnams la gsang // gsang sngags gsangs pas 'grub pa ste// rang 'byung rang
167a1(pha): la sgrub pa la// gzhan la bstan du ga la yod// de phyir gsung chen nges pa'i bka'// bskyed dang rdzogs dang gnyis med pa'i// rang 'byung
167a2(pha): ye shes lhun grub tu// bdag gi lus gnas srog chags tshogs// bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag pa'o// 'gro kun byang chub snying
167a3(pha): po can/ phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag ste// ma rig 'khrul na kun kyang 'khrul// rig cing rtogs na kun reg ste// kun rig rnam par snang mdzad lha// ri rab
167a4(pha): gser gyi le gos la ni// bya nas bya yi rang bzhin gser// de bzhin bdag nyid ci 'dra bar// de 'dra sems can thams cad kun// chos nyid ye nas lhun grub pa'i
167a5(pha): bskyed du med pa'i ngang nyid du// bya byed yid chos rnam par dag/ kun bzang yab yum lha tshogs ni// de bzhin nyid kyi bskyed rim yin// bsgom du med pa'i ting nge/
167a6(pha): 'dzin// yongs su med pa'i chos nyid lta// sgrub tu med par 'byung gi/ ye shes lha tshogs kun gyi mchog/ mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas
167a7(pha): sku ldi'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ spun grub 'gyur ba med phyiraro// rang rig ye shes lhun grub la// kun tu rtags pa'i gzugs brnyan
167b1(pha): gyis/ rang snang gang mos dkyil 'khor lnga// so so'i rgyud bzhin mngon rtog bsgom// lha nyid gsal bar ma bsgoms na// tha mal mngon zhen mi ldog cing //
167b2(pha): bsod nams tshogs chen mi rdzogs pas// ye shes tshogs ni me thob ste// gzugs med srid pa'i lha ru skye// da pas sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // rgyan dang cha
167b3(pha): lugs gsal ba bsgom// gnas skabs phyi nang rten 'brel 'grig/ mthar phyin ye shes tshogs la sbyor// gzugs sku mtshan dong dpe byad ldan// sku dang gdan
167b4(pha): khri zhing khams kyi// yon tan bskyed rIm gsal bar bya// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal gyur kyang // lha ni rang rgyud par bsgoms nas// gzung 'dzin 'khrul
167b5(pha): pa'i blo yin pas// lus grol sems ni ma grol bas// mkha' la rgyu ba la sogs pa'i// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha ru gol// de bas snang stong gnyis med kyi//
167b6(pha): rnam dag ye shes chos kyi sku// gsal dag bde ba chen po yis// rang bzhin yon tan dran pas bsgom// lus med lus de lus kyi mchog/ ye shes lus
167b7(pha): can de bzhin gshegs// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de las byung // sna tshogs gzhan la mi ltos par// rang rig
168a1(pha): thabs shes sbyor ba yis// sems can skye gnas rnam pa bzhi// rdzus skyes rig pa skad cig la// cho ga gsum ldan drod gsher la//
168a2(pha): mngal skyes sgo nga byang chub lnga// stong pa byang chub chos nyid dang // nye zla phyag mtshan sa bon rnams// zhu bas rang nyid lha rdzogs pas// 'khor ba grol phyir
168a3(pha): lha zhes brjod// bgro chags dag pas mya ngan 'das// ye nas lhun rdzogs ye shes sku// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rab kyis skad cig dran rdzogs bsgyu
168a4(pha): de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// ye nas ma skyes stong pa'i ngang // kun la khyab pa'i byang chub sems// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin// rang byung sdig pa'i sa bon
168a5(pha): las/ lha tshogs gsal bar bskyed pa'i byung // tha mal snod bcud sngon zhon sbyang // de nas dum bu cha shas lngas// tsho gas rim bzhin gzhal yas dang //

168b1(pha): rin chen 'od gsal gzhal yas khang// phyi nang kun tu gsal ba yi// chu zla 'am 'ja' tshon bzhin// dkar ser dmar lhung mthing ba'i 'od// kha dog ma 'dres so
168b2(pha): sor gsal// mnyam pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni// pad+ma 'khor lo lte ba las// mu khyud stegs bcas gru chad bzhi// par khyams gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa//
168b3(pha): sgo khyud phyi nang rta babs bzhi// 'dod yon rin chen dra ba dang // gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yi// phun sum tshogs pa'i sprin du 'khrigs// bsum gyis mi khyab
168b4(pha): yangs pa'i lam// mi 'jigs seng ge stobs chen glang // rdzu 'phrul rta mchog rma bya dbang // thog med nam mkha' lding gi khri// spyan gyis ma gos pad+mani
168b5(pha): glad na// thabs shes 'od gsal nyi zla'i steng // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni// sku ni mdun rgyab phyogasA ris med// zhal ni thal le bzhugs pa

168b7(pha): yin// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pas// byang chub ci nas bdag thob 'gyur// gzhal yas khang la phyi nang med// phyogs ris med pas kun gyi zhing /
169a1(pha): rdul gcig steng na mkha' dang mnyam// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus kyang // zhi khro'i lha ru 'dus pa yin// de yang rgyal ba rigs lngar 'dus//

169a4(pha): ye shes 'khor lo rnams// mnyam yang zhabs gnyis skyil krung bzhugs// de las shwar phyogs mi bskyod pa// 'od ldan zhe sdang rnam dag pa'i// me long ye

169b6(pha): tshogs rin chen 'phreng ba'i lha// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid ldan// gang la gang 'dul dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od zer 'phreng ba'i tshogs chen po// mtha' yas
169b7(pha): mu med brjod mi lang // zhing gi rdul snyed gsal bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par// thabs kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// sems can lus kyi

170a2(pha): shes dkyil 'khor gyis// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// dregs pa 'joms byed gdan stengs su// sku gsum ldan phyir zhal gsum pa// dka re dmar

171a7(pha): bzhugs// oM ba gi shA ri muM/ mu la pa ti/ oM badz+ra taR+sha/ dug kha tshe d+ha/ pra d+ha dz+nyA na mUr ta ye/ dz+nyA na ka ya ba gi shwa ra/ a ra ba tsa na/ ya te na ma
171b1(pha): / swA hA/ oM badz+ra g+h+ri ga g+hu h+ya dz+nyA na swa rba sid d+hi hU hUM hU/ 'jam dpal mchog la brten nas su// shes rab spobs pa bskyed pa ra bya// thugs rdza chen po spyan ras/

171b3(pha): badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM phaT/ Da ki ni dza la saM b+ha ra hUM hUM/ oM hri ha hA hUM hUM phaT/ thugs rje'i 'phrin las rnam gsum gyis// 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar

171b5(pha): ye shes he ru ka/ bdag med chos dang yang dag sbyor// phyi nang thabs kyi khyad par yin// oM badz+ra pa ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ni laM b+ha ra d+ha rA d+hA ra hI ta ya hUM phaT/
171b6(pha): oM badz+ra tsan d+ha ro na ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ru na tsa la le hUM phaT/ oM d+he bi tsu badz+ra hU hU phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra ka d+ha ri he badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM g+ho ri g+haM/ tso rai
171b7(pha): tsam b+he ta li baM/ 'ag+harma raM g+ha/ pu ka pi saM/ sha ba ri shaM/ tsan d+ha mai baM/ swo b+haM ni a hUM/ gang gis sgrub pa'i thabs brtsams pa/
172a1(pha): gtor mas las kun grub par byed// phyi nang chags med gtor ma ste// ji ltar rigs par bsgrub pos btang // nad dang nyon
