271a3(pha): grub/ ces bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ rang sems bla mar bsgrub pa'i mdo byang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
271a4(pha): / de nas thugs rje ye shas rtsal gyis yang gsol pa/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// mra rtogs 'khrul pa'i sems can la// gzhi
271a5(pha): la sku gsum ji ltar gnas/ thog mar bla ma'i byin rlabs kyis// gzhi las lam du ji ltar smin// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to//
271a6(pha): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa// sems can ma lus thams cad la// kun gzhi byang chub sems las byung // byang chub sems la sku gsum
271a7(pha): gyi// ngo bo ye nas lhun grub tu// sems nyid mi rtog chos skur gnas// sems nyid bde ba longs skur gnas// sems nyid gau stsal ba spul skur ka nas//
271b1(pha): zla gasgyum bla m+bu'i dgongs pa de// sems kyis khyab ma du kun la khyug/ ye nas 'bral med gnas gyur kyang // de nyidadu m+b+ha shes glo bur gyis// mkha' la
271b2(pha): sprin gyis bsgribs pa ltar// bdag 'dzin zhan bris ma rig 'khrulo// dug gsum spyad pas khams gsum 'khor// de nyid gzung 'dzin gsal ba na// rang
271b3(pha): sems sku gsum bla ma ru// na bun sangs pa'i nam mkha' ru// sngon du lhag gis smin nas 'ong // de phyir bdag 'dzin grol nas su// snang rig sems
271b4(pha): gsum bdag med du// sku gsum lhun grub bde ba che// rang rig rang dbang bskur ba yis// rang dbang sems la thob pa na// 'dus byas rdzas dang dkyil
271b5(pha): 'khor gyis// kun rdzob mchog dbang bskur mi dgos// bskur yang rig pa'i dbang mi thob// 'on kyang mos pa'i rten 'bral gyis// thun mong byin rlabs/
271b6(pha): 'byung ba srid// yang dag sku gsum mi rtogs pas// thog mar rig pa rtsal dbang bstan// sbyor dngos rjes gsum+ba byin gyis rlobs// sbyor ba slob mas
271b7(pha): bla ma la// chos kyi sku ru mos byas la// rang sems chos skur ma rtogs pas// gti mug 'khor bar 'khyams pa yis// sdug bsngal sems can snying re
272a1(pha): rje/ de rnams chos sku thob par bya// snyam du mos pa'i sems bskyed kyis// phyag btsal me tog gtor byas la// rnam dag chos
272a2(pha): dbyings pho brang du// skye med chos sku'i bla ma la// bdag nyid gus pas gsol ba 'debs// ma rig gauti mug rang grol nas// rang byung ye shes lhun
272a3(pha): grub tu/ chos sku'i byin brlabs dbang bskur zhu// zhes pas gsol ba ldan gsum gdagra// dngos gzhi bla mas slob ma la// ma yengs sems nyid rtsa
272a4(pha): gaN+DIg la// rang byung chos sku'i dbang 'di bskur// chos skye pho brang chos kyi dbyings// cir yang ma grub yangs pa'i klong // chos kyi sku ni spros dang bral/
272a5(pha): gcig tu ma grub gnyis su me// kun la khyab pa'i thugs rje can// ngo bo nyid du lhun grub 'dis// sems nyid chos skur dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin
272a6(pha): gyis rlabs// khyod kyi sems nyid de ltar yin// rang sems chos sku'i dbang thob 'gyur// zhes pas chos sku'i dbang bskur la// rjes snang rang sems chos
272a7(pha): grur grug// chos su'i mang rtsal langs sku'i dpag// rajirig nyid la spen bya'i phyi// gyur ba rmob bum ma ma yi// langs spyod rdzogs su'i mos byab la/ @
272b1(pha): rig longs sgyur ma rtogs pas// 'dod chags srid pas 'khor bas 'khyams// 'dod log sems can snying re rje// de rnams ljongs skur thob par byed// snyam
272b2(pha): du 'jug pa'i sems skyed kyis// phyag btsal me tog gtor byas la// gsal dag bde chen po brang du// ma 'gags longs sku'i bla ma la// bdag nyid gus
272b3(pha): bas gsol ba 'debs// 'dod chags zhen pa rang grol nas// rang rig ye shes rang grol du// longs sku'i byin brlabs dbang bskur zhu// zhes gsal ba
272b4(pha): lan gsum gdab// dngos gzhi bla mas slob ma la// ma yengs yid kyis rtse gcig la// rang gsal longs sku'i dbang 'di bskur// longs sku'i pho brang bde ba
272b5(pha): can// zhing khams rnam dag bsdam mi khyab// longs spyod rdzogs sku gsal la stong // dngos por ma grub bzung du med// kun tu snang ba'i dab can la//
272b6(pha): rang byung ye shes gsal mdangs 'dis// rang rig longs skur dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin gyi rlobs// khyod kyi rlung rigs de bzhin yin// rang rig
272b7(pha): longs skur rang dbang thob// ces pas longs sku'i dbang bskur la// rjes snang rang rig longs skur bsgrubs// longs sku'i rnam 'phrul sprub sku'i dbang // rang
273a1(pha): snang nyid las smin bya'i phyir/ sbyor ba slob bus bla ma la// sprul pa'i sku ru mos byas la// sdang sems gnyis snang 'khor bar 'khyams//
273a2(pha): log rtog sems can skang re rje// de rnams sprul skur thob par bya// snyam du don dam sems bskyed kyis// phyag btsal me tog gtor byas la// skyen med pad+ma'i
273a3(pha): pho brang du// des med sprul sku'i bla ma la// bdag nyid gus pos gsol ba 'debs// log rtog zhe sdang rang grol nas// rang snang ye shes rang gsal du// sprul
273a4(pha): s+yA b+he ni rlabs dbang bskur ni// zhes pas gsal ba len gsum gdag/ dngos gzhi rnams slab ma la// sa yengs snang ba rtse gcig la// rang snang
273a5(pha): sku'i dbang 'di bskur// sprul sku'i pho brang u rgyan yul// rang rang gang mos zhing khams nas// sprul pa'i sku ni ngo mtshar can// nye ring med pa kun tu 'byon//
273a6(pha): gang mas der 'byon byin rlabs can// rang snang dag pa'i sku mchog 'dis// rang snang sprul skur dbang bskur ro// de bzhin nyid du byin gyis rlobs// khyod kyi
273a7(pha): snang ba de bzhin yin// rang snang sprul skur rang dbang thob// rjes snang rang snang sprul skur bsgrub// sku gsum ngo bo dbyer med pas// thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs
273b1(pha): dbang // lhan cig skyes par smin bya'i phyir// sbyor ba slob mas bla ma la// bde chen sku ru mos byas la// sku gsum dbyer med ma rtogs pa// der 'dzin shes byi
273b2(pha): sgrib pa yis// sangs rgyas ma thob snying ri rje// snyam du dmigs med sems skyed kyis// phyag btsal me tog gtor byas la// yang dag 'od gsal pho brang du//
273b3(pha): phyogs med bde chen bla ma la// bdag nyid dgus pas gsol ba 'debs// tha dad gzung 'dzin rang grol nas// rang byung sku gsum lhun grub tu// bde chen byin rlabs
273b4(pha): dbang bskur zhu// zhes pas gsol ba lan gsum gdab// dngos gzhi bla mas slob ma la// snang srid sku gsum dbyer med cing // lhun grub bde chen dbang 'di
273b5(pha): bskur/ bAde chen pho brang rnam dag dbyings// lhun grub 'od gsal kun bzabs klong // bde tshan sku ni 'dus ma byas// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub//
273b6(pha): gsal la 'dzin med bde ba cha// kun mkhyen kun shesA kun rtog bral// sgrib med thams cad mkhyen pa 'dis// rdzogs sangs rgyas par dbang bskur ro//
273b7(pha): de bzhin nyid du byin gyis rlobs// khyod kyi ngo bo de bzhin nyid// sku gsum lhun grub rang dbang thob// rjes snang sku gsum dbyer med du// bde ba chen por
274a1(pha): rtsal sbyang ngo // 'bras bu myur du smin par 'gyur// 'di thob sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbang bskur ma lus thob pa yin// bde gshegs
274a2(pha): bka' lung thams cad rdzogs// sku gsum bla mar rang nge 'phrod// de nyid dbang gi mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las//
274a3(pha): rang sams bla mar byin rlabs dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas thugs nA ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol pa/ a ma/ bcom ldan bde ba
274a4(pha): chen po lags// sems can sangs rgyas rgyud nyid la// byin rlabs dbang gi sa gzhi smin pa// lam gyis nyams su blangs pa yis// 'bras bu sku gsum ji ltar 'grub
274a5(pha): de do na 'khor la gsung du gsol// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang sems sangs rgyas sku gsum du// ma rtogs gzung
274a6(pha): 'dzin 'khor bar 'khyams// rtogs pa'i nyams len mngon sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma mchis te// rang sems sangs rgyas sku gsum yin//
274a7(pha): yin la chags 'dzin med pa yis// de yi nyams len rtsol ba bral// ma bcos bzhag pas sku gsum grub/ de phyir da lta sgrub pa bstan// lus ngag yid gsum
274b1(pha): sgyu sgyum du// rang bzhin nyid du 'od gsal bar// spyan gyis grub nas rtogs pa la// kun rdzob zlos byas sgrub mi dgos// rang snang sgrub sgyur gsul ba la/
274b2(pha): bskyed rim mi dgos dran pas gsal// rang sems stong pa chos sku yin// stong gsal 'gag med la ngos sku yin// cir yang 'char ba sprul pa'i sku// de gsu
274b3(pha): dbyir med bla ma yin// byas pa med par kun la rtogs// rtogs kyang rtsal ni ma rdzogs pas// bu chung mi ru rtogs gyur kyang // gsor na ma byas rtsa la ma
274b4(pha): rdzogs/ de bzhin sku gsum yin gyur yang // de nyid brtan pa ma thob pas// lus ngag yid gsum tha mal lus// de phyir sku gsum bla ma de// ma bcos san/
274b5(pha): kha ma yengs bsgrub// rang sems sku gsum rtsal rdzogs 'gyur// de nyid sku gsum bla ma dngos// sangs rgyas kun dang dbye ba med// de ltar ma rtogs gang
274b6(pha): zag gi/ sku gsu ma logs nas bsgrub 'dod cing // 'dus byas kun rdzob cho ga yis// me da la rtog 'dzin rtag lha dang // rtogs la med stong rdzogs ri ma
274b7(pha): dang / gnyis med gnyis 'dzin bsnyen bsgrub kyis// sku gsum bla ma 'grub mi 'gyur// yin kyang mos snang mthu rtas kyis// tshogs rdzogs thun mong sgrib
275a1(pha): pa 'dag/ mchog gi don la gnol bar 'gyur// de phyir bla ma rang la sgrub// thams cad rang sems 'di nyid yin// bskyed rim spyan drangs bzhug
275a2(pha): su gsol// phyag 'tshal mi dgos rang re yin// mchod 'bul mi dgos mnyes byed med// bstod bskul mi dgos gnyis su med// bsnyen bsgrub mi dgos ye nas
275a3(pha): grub/ sku gsum rang nyid yin pa la// rang la yin lugs gsal 'debs ni// rang sems skye med chos kyi sku// bde chen snang ba mtha' yas yin// gnas ni chos
275a4(pha): dbyings snying dkyil na// rtogs dus chos kyi dbyings yin te// ma rtogs snying la gnas par bzung // cir yang ma grub stong pa la// kun tu gsal bas snang ba ste//
275a5(pha): phyogs ris med par mtha' las 'das// gzung 'dzin med par bde ba che// dbyings rig gnyis med ngo bo nyid// 'di dkar lhag ga gsal ba yis// chos kyi sku
275a6(pha): zhes gsal ba yin// gzugs sku ma grub chos sku las// sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las byung // dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo yin// rigs kyi bdag po bla ma ste/
275a7(pha): rang sems bla ma chos sku la// ji ltar byas kyang 'gyur ldog med// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// de la nyams len ci yang med// de nyid dang du skyong ba yin//
275b1(pha): rang sems 'gag med gsal tsam na// longs sku thugs rje rigs bzhi yin// gnas ni zhing khams rtsa la gnas// rtogs na mkha' spyod bde chen la// ma rtogs
275b2(pha): rtswa dang rlung du 'char// sgo lnga gsal bas sku yin la// dngos po med pas ye shes te// sku dang ye shes longs spyod pas// phyi nang kun tu gsal ba la// gzugs
275b3(pha): nyid gsal stong 'dzin pa med// me long ye shes longs spyod pa'i// badz+ra thugs rje chen po yin// sgra ni grag stong ginyis su med// mnyam nyid ye shes longs spyod
275b4(pha): rdzogs// rat+na'i thugs rje chen po yin// ji ni tshor stong 'du shes bral// kun rtogs ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// pad+ma'i thugs rje chen po yin// ro ni myong stong
275b5(pha): lhun gyi sa grub// bya grub ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// karma'i thugs rje chen po yin// rang sems sku gsum nyag gcig la// ma 'gags sgo lngar gsal tsam na//
275b6(pha): zhi ba longs spyod rdzogs sku 'byung // gsal char gas su shar tsam na// khro bo longs spyod rdzogs sku 'byung // snang la rang bzhin ma grub pas// ye shes sku yi dkyil
275b7(pha): 'khor can// ye shes zhan 'dzin med pa yis// bla ma longs spyod rdzogs pa de// ji ltar byas kyang 'gag pa med// rab byung rang gsal lhun gyis grub// de la
276a1(pha): sgrub rgyu ci yang med// rang gsal nyid du skyong ba yin// rang sems snang bar shar tsam na// nges pa med pa sprul pa'i sku// u rgyan pad+ma
276a2(pha): mtshan brgyad yin// gnas ni u rgyan yul na gnas// rtogs na u rgyan ko sha la// ma rtogs tshogs kyad yul de yin// rang sems gcig gi 'char tshul las
276a3(pha): rnam shas tshogs brgyad byung ba yis// gang du 'char ni nges med la// gcig las brgyad byung sprul sku yin// yin kyang sems nyid chos sku lus// gzhan gyi
276a4(pha): skyon gyis ma gos pas// u rgyan pad+ma zhes pa de// mig gi rnam shes snang stong tshogs// dngos med spul sku pad+ma yin// rna ba'i rnam shes grags stong tshogs//
276a5(pha): bdi na med seng ge sgra sgrogs yin// sna yi rnam shes tshor stong tshogs// 'dzin med nyi ma 'od zer yin// lce yi rnam shes myong stang tshogs// zhen med pad+ma sa ma
276a6(pha): b+ha yin/ lus kyi rnam shes reg stong chogs// chags med blo ldan mchog sred yan// kun gzhi rnam shes ye stong tshogs// gzhi me da shA kya seng ge yin//
276a7(pha): nyon mongs rnam shes rig stong tshogs// rtog med pad+ma rgyal po yin// yid kyi rnam shes 'gyus stong tshogs// gtad med pad+ma thod 'phreng yin// de ltar rang
276b1(pha): sems chos kyi sku// tshogs brgyad yul du shar tsam na// rang snang sprul sku pad+ma brgyad// de las kyang ni ma 'gags pas// snang ba gang shar sprul sku yin//
276b2(pha): chos dbyings stong pa'i nam mkha' lA// rig pa ye shes chos kyi sku// ma 'gags rol par shar ba yis// sprul sku dpa' bo mkha' 'gro yin// snang bsgra/
276b3(pha): kyi 'jig rten kun// bla ma sprul sku'i gzhal yas yin// 'gro ba sems can ma lus kun// bla ma sprul sgyu'i ngo bo yin// snang ba rang sems yin pa'i
276b4(pha): phyir// gang ltar byas pa de ltar yin// snang yang sems las gnyis su med// gnyis med snang ba spu la sku yin// sprul sku'i snang ba gsal ba la// rig pa
276b5(pha): hu ra gdon byung rgyal gtad// rang snang mi 'gyur gzhan mi 'gyur// rang snang sprul skur shes pa na// thams cad sprul skur 'tshe ra ba yin// ya nga'i phyogs su

276b7(pha): shes na// su yang gnyis 'angam du pa ma grug/ sems kyad kyi mam mtsha ba yis// snang mchis pa pa rdzo // rang rnapa chen med b+h+yo gyi
277a1(pha): ji ltar shar yang 'dzin pa med// zhen med rang shar rang grol du// sprul sku chu zla bzhin du gsal// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub// de la bsgrub

277a3(pha): lus kyi 'dzin pa zad// lha byed rtogs pa rang grol yin// rang sems dngos med gsal ba'i tshe// longs sku yin pas de nyid spyod// rang reg rlung gi 'dzin pa
277a4(pha): zad// gnyis 'dzin 'dzin pa'i rtag lta med// gcod byed rtog pa rang sar grol// rang sems mi g.yo gnas pa'i tshe// chos sku yin pas de kar bzhag/ stong
277a5(pha): par 'dzin pa'i chad lta med// rang sems 'di yin 'dzin pa zad// bsgom bya bsgom byed rang sar grol// rang sems sku gsum bla ma las// ji ltar byas
277a6(pha): kyang mi 'da' bas// rig pa gcer bu lding bar grol// thams cad dbyer med minyam pa nyid// bde gshegs ma lus 'dus pa'i sku// bde chen thams cad
277a7(pha): mkhyen pa yin// de nyid don de bskyang ba las// gzhan gyi bya rgyu ci yang med// snang rig sems gsum dbyer med du// rtogs med sangs rgyas thams cad
277b1(pha): 'grub/ mtha' yas bdag dang dbye ba med// yon tan ma lus thob pa yin// sku gsum rnam mkhyen lhun gyis grub// 'gro don 'phrin las ma lus rdzogs//
277b2(pha): 'khor ba dong nas sprugs pa yin// de nyid bsgrub pa'i mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ rang sems

277b5(pha): zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khams gsum sems can thams cad lo// sku gsum gdod nas lhun gyi sa grub// bde dang/
277b6(pha): gas la dang mi rtog gsum// ma bcos gzhi yi sku gsum yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// rtsal sbyong la ma gyi sku gsum yin// chos sku
277b7(pha): longs sku smra la sku gsum// mthar thug 'bras bu'i sku gsum yin// don la de rnams dbyer med de// gdod nas lhun grub sangs rgyas kyi// ngo bo yin
278a1(pha): kyang ma rtogs 'khrulnga// dug gsum zhen pas 'khor bar 'khyams// bdag 'dzin rang khar ma zhen na// dug gsum sku gsum lhun

278b2(pha): phyi ru sha dang pags pa grub// nang du rtsa dang rlung du grub// kun rdzob zhe sdang de nyid las// rten nas don dam thabs la ma ni// phyi ru lus kyi 'khrul 'khor

278b6(pha): nas de na dam grol lam ni// phyi ru snang ba'i rjes mi 'brang // nang du sems nyid ma bcos bzhag/ gsang ba gti mug rig stong du// zhen pa med par rtsal
278b7(pha): sbyangs pas/ bdag 'dzin zhon pa kun zad nas// thams cad chos skur grol nas 'gro// de nyid lam du khyer ba yin// gnad kyi man ngag 'di rtogs na//

279a3(pha): 'dzin rnam rtag med pa ru// snang srid thams cad gsal ba ni// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas yin// rang rig chos sku gzhan don du// longs sku sprul
279a4(pha): sku'i gzugs su sha ra// shar yang rtsol rtog med pa yis// bla ma skra gsum lhun grub yin// chos nyid dang la 'gyur ldog med// de nyid gdams pa'i mthar thug

279a6(pha): / de nas thugs rje ye shes rtsal gyis yang gsol ba/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// rang sems bla mar bsgrub pa yis// cha rkyen thun
279a7(pha): mong yan lag tu// las tshogs man ngag ji ltar lags// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
279b1(pha): rang sems bla ma sku gsum gyis// thun mong 'phrin las bzhi yin te// phyi rol gdon dang nadra gri gdon// gasdang ba nyon mongs rnam rtog kun// ma bcos 'dzin me
279b2(pha): rang sar gzhi la// gtad med ngang du zhi gnas 'gro// chos sku zhi ba'i 'phrin las yin// phyi yi longs spyod nang gi tshe// gasdang ba ye shes 'khor rgyas pa// shin tu
279b3(pha): gsal bar mdangs ston pas// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rgyas// longs sku rgyas pa'i 'phrin las yin// phyi ru ma mthun rigs pas gtor// nang du mdo don
279b4(pha): rlung sems bsdu// gsal la 'gyur ldog gang dgos pa// rang gsal rig pa'i stobs kyis bsgyur// dbang drag sprul sku'i 'phrin las yin// sku gsum 'phrin las
279b5(pha): dbyer mi phyed// don la rang byung ye shes yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed mgon// 'gro ba'i don la ston pa po// de nyid 'phrin las mthar thug go/ zhes
279b6(pha): bka' stsal to// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ thun mong las tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas thugs rje ye shes
279b7(pha): rtsal gyis yang gsol pa/ e ma/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po lags// rang sems bla ma sku gsum du// lhun grub gsang ba'i rgyud mchog 'di// dam tshig gtad rgya
280a1(pha): gang ltar byed// de don 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dus bzhi sangs rgyas
280a2(pha): ma lus rnams// sku gsum bla ma nyid la 'dus// sems nyid don gyi rgyud mchog 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po gtso// gsang sngags rgyal po kun gyi rje// 'di/
280a3(pha): rtogs 'gro kun rdzogs sangs rgyas// gsang sngags rgyud chen gzhan dag ni// byas bcos lam gyi rgyud yin te// 'di nyid 'bras bu da ltar 'byin// yang gsang
280a4(pha): snying po'i rgyud yin pa sra// skal ldan mthong thos reg pas grol// skal med la go lha'i rang bzhin bsgribs// log pa'i gdul bya thabs kyis 'dul// thugs rje chen
280a5(pha): po khyod la gtad// snyigs ma'i 'gro ba 'dren pa yi// bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong gi sras// mtha' yas sprul pa'i skur byon nas// mtsho skyes pad+ma 'byung gnas
280a6(pha): kyis/ rgyud mchog 'gro ba'i don byed 'gyur// bstan pa mi mjed khams su 'byung // 'khor ba dong nas sprugs byed de// de bsgrubs sangs rgyas kun 'grub bo// sprul
280a7(pha): pa rnams kyi mthar thug go/ zhes bka' stsal to// der 'khor thams cad sku gsum bla ma'i ngo bor yi rangs te chos nyid kyi ngang du grol lo// bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i

288a6(pha): gang byed so so'i bsham bu gdags// 'bru 'bum grangs kyi bsnyen pa ste// dus kyi tshad ni lo gsum la// tshad ni rtags rdzogs bar du bzlas// de las nges
288a7(pha): med shes par bya// rgyal po pho nya lta bu dang // zla ba skar 'phreng mgal ma'i tshul// bung ba mtshang grol lta bu ste// 'dzab dgongs bzhi dang ldan par shes//

296a3(pha): mnyam rol gnas// mi bskyod rdo rje bde ba'i dbyings phyug ma// yab yum gnyis kyis cho 'phrul spros pa las// pad+ma 'byung gnas blo ldan mchog gi sras//
296a4(pha): ma 'od zer seng ge sgra sgrogs dang // pad+ma sa ma b+ha pad+ma rgyal po ste// shAkya seng ge rdo rje gro bo lod// kun gyi dgyes skong sprul pa'i yum chen brgyad// ye shes rje mo
296a5(pha): bde ba'i rnal 'byor ma// bdag med lha mo rdo rje 'phra me na ma// rgya mtsho'i gling gnas mkha' 'gro zhi ba mtsho// shAkya de ma mkha' 'gro bdud 'dul ma// gdul bya'i
296a6(pha): 'dod skyong zhing nyams dang ldan// pad+ma dbang chen rigs byed lha mor bcas// bde stong rol pa'i cho 'phrul sprul pa'i 'khor// rdo rje nyi ma thogs med rgyal po dang //
296a7(pha): dbang chen nyi ma gser gyi nyi ma dang // rdo rje khro bo rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang // ro langs bde ba rdo rje thog rgod 'bar// yum chen legs skyes 'phra min dbyings phyug ma/
296b1(pha): srid pa'i rgyal mo nyi khros dbang mo che// gar gyi dbang phyug las kyi dbang mo che// srid pa chags byed 'byung ba lnga yi bdag/ bde stong blag med ro yis tshim par
296b2(pha): byed/ dpa' bo chen po rigs 'dzin thod pa rtsal// mkha' 'gro nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// yab yum gnyis kyi cha 'phrul 'khor gyi tshogs// lhun gyis
296b3(pha): grub dang phyag rgya chen po dang // tshe la dbang dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang // dam tshig dbang dang man ngag lung dang ni// shes rab rgyud dang chag nyams skong ba ste//
296b4(pha): de ltar rigs 'dzin bzhi dang slob dpon bzhi// spyan gcig ma dang rnal 'byor dgyes sde mo// dbang gi rgyal mo rnal 'byor ro langs ma// dam tshig bdag mardon
296b5(pha): skul byed ma// skyod byed tshangs ma tshe 'dzin rgyal mo ste// de ltar yab yum rnams kun mchog la rol// rdo rje drag po khams gsum srid pa'i bdag/ yab
296b6(pha): yum gnyis kyi che 'phrul dpal 'bar las// ya ma ra tsa skos rjes drang dkar dang // srin po glog 'phreng yag sham dpal dang // gza' bdud spu gri klu bdud
296b7(pha): mgo dgu pa// dbang phyug chen po ma hA ka la'i sku// za byed nag mo bdud mo re ma ti// khrag mig ma dang mon mo me bsrun ma// lcam cig ma dang thog gi bu
297a1(pha): ma/ um d+he ba lha mo dung skyong ma// bstan pa bsrung tshul yab yum 'jigs pa'i sku// sangs rgyas dpa' bzod pa'i dum bu dang // sangs
297a2(pha): dpa mA su ma sa / rdzun pa skye na ldan dpa coM dang / pa mamam
297a3(pha): bo dang / 'dzin ging 'gugs byed sgrol gang gasred byed dang // stobs gang za byed rgyud ging las byed lnga// rdo rje dpa' mo rin chen dpa' mo dang // pad+ma dpa' mo
297a4(pha): las kyi dpa' mo dang // rdo rje gong mo rin chen ging mau dang // pad+ma ging ma las kyi gang mo ste// 'khril zhing sbyor bas dpal gyi bka' lung nyan// rta mgrin dbang
297a5(pha): chen A~M ka tsa ti gnyis// gtso bo'i tshul las sprul pa'i 'khor brgyad kyang // ye shes zil gnon las kyi khro bo dang // ye shes ma mo zil gnon khyung zil gnon/
297a6(pha): po rgyud zil gnon mo rgyud zil gnon dang // klu 'dul khro bo gnod sbyin 'dul byed de// yum chen mi pham ma dang khro gnyer ma// spyan gcig ma dang rdo rje rtsa 'jig
297a7(pha): ma/ rdo rje las byed gshen rje las byed ma// klu mo las byed gnod sbyin las byed ma// yang yum rnams kyang bde stong ye shes bskyed// lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i
297b1(pha): dbyings phyug ma// yang yum gnyis las sprul pa'i khro bo ni// rnam par rgyal ba dang ni gshin rje gshed// rta glen dbang chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // dbyig pa sngon
297b2(pha): po dang ni mi g.yo mgron// 'dod pa'i rgyal po khams gsum rnam par rgyal// khro bo hUM ka ra dang stobs po che// rdo rje mda' skem dur khrod bdag mo dang // rdo rje
297b3(pha): gtum mo rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// rdo rje sder mo rdo rje gtun khung ma// rdo rje snyems ma rdo rje bskul byed ma// rdo rje sgra 'byin rdo rje gsod byed ma// yab yum rnams kyang rang
297b4(pha): rang 'phrin las brtson// kun kyang gtso 'khor tshul du rnam par gnas// mun pa'i smag sel gsal snang ye shes ston// khwa gdong phag gdong khye gdong 'ug gdong
297b5(pha): ma/ brtan byed pho nya ma chab 'joms byed ma// phyogs dang mtshams rnams dpal gyi lung bzhi nyan// dpa' bo thod dbyig dpa' mo rab gtum ma// dpa' bo ke
297b6(pha): rus dpa' mo gtum mig ma// keng rus gtum po dpa' mo 'od ldan ma// dpa' bo mche gtsigs dpa' mo sna chen ma// su ra b+he ri dpa' mo brtan ma dang // 'od
297b7(pha): dpag med pa dpa' mo me thung ma// rdo rje 'od ldan lang ka'i dbang phyug me// rdo rje sku mchog dpa' ma shing grib ma// rdo rje gzhon nu dpa' mos srungs ma// rdo rje la
298a1(pha): dpa' mo 'od chen ma// rab tu dga' ba dpa' mo rlung shugs ma// dpa' bo hUM mdzad dpa' mo chang thung ma// rab tu bzang po dpa' mo gtsug
298a2(pha): phud mA/ rdo rje bzang po dpa' mo rab bzang ma// dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpa' mo rta rna ma// spyan mi bzang dang dpa' mo khwa gdong ma// stobs chen rgyal po
298a3(pha): tsakra'i thugs chen ma// rin chen rdo rje dpa' mo dung rgyas ma// rti g+h+r-in rgyal po dpa' mo glang snum// nam mkha'i snying po 'khor lo'i go cham// dpa' ldan
298a4(pha): he ru ka dpalnga rab dpa' ma// pad+ma gar dbang dpa' mo stobs chen ma// rnam par snang mdzad dpa' mo 'khor myur ma// dpa' bo sems dpa' dpa' mo pon 'grus
298a5(pha): ma/ dpal gyi bka' bstod lung gi pho nyar bcas// so so rang rang las kyi gnyar 'dzin cing // stobs shugs rtsal ldan drod nyul bstan pa bsrung // de sogs
298a6(pha): drung don dpag med ye shes lha// rtog pa yul la drang phyir rnam par spros// de ltar lha yi rkang grangs su// shes par gyis shig 'dus pa'i 'khor// nga
298a7(pha): yis drang por bshad pa la// khyod kyis nges pa'i don du bzung // slad dus zung 'jug chen por sbyor// la thag dbyer med nyid du chod// bla ma yi dam mkha'
298b1(pha): 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha'i rkang grangs mtshan bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// I// / yang ni 'dus
298b2(pha): pa'i 'khor tshogs nyo ni// byin gyis brlabs pa rnam mang yang // rnam pa lnga ru 'dus pa ste// snying rje byang chub sems b+he la// rang gi bsam rgyud byin
298b3(pha): gyis brlabs// gar sdod mu rgyan gnas su mos// sa phyogs thams cad byin gyis brlabs// khang pa gzhal yas khang du dmigs// gnas mal byin gyis
298b4(pha): brlab par bya// gang tshogs lha yi rnam par lta// ye shes lha ru byin gyis brlabs// bza' btung bdud rtsi ru mos bya ste// mchod pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlabasau//
298b5(pha): de ltar byin brlabs rnam lnga las// spros pa'i yan lag bsam mi khyab// de ltar byin rlabs lnga ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor spyod pa rmad du byung // 'di don ye shes
298b6(pha): rmad po che// med pa'i dbyings las dpag med snang // snang tsam nyid na rnam grol ba// gdengs thob lha yi rol par 'gyur// phyi nang snang srid dkyil 'khor
298b7(pha): nyid/ gzhal yas khang dang lha rnams kun// spros la dga' rnams sna khrid phyir// 'jug pa'i thabs la snang ba yin// snang ba sprin rigs 'dra ba la//
299a1(pha): mngon par zhen la lha mi snang // yang dgra gland kyi don bstan pa// sa mtshams sbyar bas shes par bya// rtog pas spags pa'i lha rnams ni//
299a2(pha): byin gyi sa ma brlabs rlangs las byung // rlangs pa sel ba'i nye zar du// ye shes rab ldan rang snang ltos// e ma 'di ni thabs kyi gsang // ma dag 'khrul
299a3(pha): po'i blo can la// rgyud don dgongs pa yang yang gsang // 'khrul 'khor dag la lhang nger snang // des na byin gyis brlabs pa yang // gnad du che bas shes
299a4(pha): par bya/ gang gis gtan la phab des kyang // snying gi phur du che ba yin// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ byin gyis
299a5(pha): brlab pa'i gnad bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// I// yang ni 'khor tshogs sems dpa' nyon// dkar ser dmar ljang la
299a6(pha): sogs pa// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba ni// ye shes lha la mngon snang ba// gdul bya mos blo tha dad lnga// rab tu dkar gling 'tsher ba dang // de bzhin
299a7(pha): dmar la dngas pa dang // nag la rngam pa'i rang bzhin can// ser gsal gser gyi 'od 'dra ba/ la lar mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sngo skya dang na
299b1(pha): thal ba'i mdog/ yang ni char sprin mun ru ma bzhin// dmar ser gur kub mdog ltar 'tsher// smug nag dang ni rab tu ldang // dud pa'i mdog la
299b2(pha): rnam par snang // la la phyed gzugs ri mo can// 'ja' rnams lta bur khra ba'i mdog/ de sogs kha dgo rnam pa ni// gcig tu ma nges du mar snang // de
299b3(pha): yi dgongs don gnad rnamasaM ni// thugs rje che ldan rnams kyis ni// gdul bya'i re 'dod skong don du// rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang // yang ni 'phrin las sna
299b4(pha): tshogs kyis// bsgyur byed rim par 'phros pa ste// de phyir gang 'dod blo yis bsgyur// 'on kyang gzu lum dgag pa'i phyir// phyogs dang de bzhin phyog bral ba
299b5(pha): dkar ser dmar ljang mthing kar snang // 'gyur med dag paM de bzhini nyid// brda dang rtags kyi rim pa yang // rab tu spros shing bstan pa'o// rnam dag gzugs
299b6(pha): kyi sku rnams la// rnam par nges pa'i kha dog can// sprul dang yang sprul du ma byung // mdzad pa'i 'phrin las bsam mi khyab// mkha' yis khyab pa'i gdul
299b7(pha): bya le/ 'dul byed thabs kyi rgyal pos spros// gdul bya'i snang tshul du ma la// 'dul byed bye brag bsam mi khyab// thabs mkhas snying rje'i cho 'phrul du// kha
300a1(pha): do m+b+ha no/ snang ba'o// bla ma yi dmas da blo thams rgyud kyi sgra rgyu shes kyi'i bu las// ye shes su ma dog/ gi rnam par des
300a2(pha): bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// I// / kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// de ltar ye shes lha rnams kyi// rgyan dang cha lugs ji lta
300a3(pha): na// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan gyi// lha yi cho 'phrul sna tshogs la// rgyan dang cha lugs ma nges kyang // gdul bya'i bsam pa tshim slad du// rol pa'i cho 'phrul
300a4(pha): bstan pa ni// zhi ba'i tshul dang khro bo'i tshul// de bzhin zhi ma khro yi tshul// khro bo la yang rnam pa dgu// khro dang brngam dang rab tu khro// 'jigs gzugs
300a5(pha): ldan khro ngang gis khro// dam tshig dbang gis khro ba dang // sprul pa lta bur khro ba dang // rnam 'gyur shugs kyis khro ba ste// khro tshul yan lag bcas pa'o//
300a6(pha): rang bzhin bab kyis khro ba de// 'khor ba bsnyil phyir khros nas ni// spyod lam gtum pos log byed rnams// 'joms shing rlag par byed pa ste// ba spu spu gri'i so
300a7(pha): ltar gzings// lag na 'joms byed mtshon cha thogs// rab tu drag rtsub ngar dang ldan// rngam pa'i tshul gyis khro ba ni// 'gying tshul bcas nas am tshig bstan//
300b1(pha): mig bgrad mche bas ma mchu bsdam// lag na mtshon thogs rdegs tshul ston// rab tu khrol dur khrod chas// stobs ldan glang chen ko rlon dang // mi yi lpags pa khrag
300b2(pha): ris can// gcan gzan stug gi shun lpags rnams// stod khebs smad dkris rked la bcings// khrag zhag thal ba'i tshom bus byug/ thod 'phreng sbrul gyi chun pos brgyan
300b3(pha): kha gdangs mche gtsigs mig gsum bgrad// lus la bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// ha ha hUM hUhUM phaT phaT sgrogs// lag nas mtshon cha'i char pa 'bebs// skal
300b4(pha): med la sogs 'joms pa'o// 'jigs pa'i gzugs ston khro bo ni// sku che yan lag rags pa la// dpa' brjid ldan zhing 'gying bag can// mthong ba tsam gyis
300b5(pha): skrag pa'o// ngang gis khro la rnam pa gnyis// ye shes lha yi ngang khro dang // las byed shan pa lta bu ste// ye shes lha yi dang khro ba// khro bo'i cha lugs du mar bcas
300b6(pha): dgongs don g.yo ba med pa'o// las byed shan pa lta bu ni// nam yang brtse sems bral ba la// yang ni gnag pa'i dmigs med par// gang byed drag shul ldan pa'o//
300b7(pha): dam tshig dbang gis khro ba ni// gshis la khro ba med bzhin du// log spyod sgrol bar dam bcas dang // sngon tshe dpal gyi spyan snga ru// ru tra sgrol bar khas
301a1(pha): blangs nas// ji bzhin du yang khro ba la// gnas skabs dus skabs bsnun nas so// de la cha lug nges pa med// sprul pa lta
301a2(pha): bur khro ba ni// zhi ba'i ngang las khro skur snang // glang la tsa 'dul rnam 'gyur can// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa'o// rnam 'gyur shugs kyis
301a3(pha): khro ba ni/ stang stabs rnam pa mang po dang // rol pa'i cha lugs du mar bcas// drag po'i shugs kyis rtsub 'khrug ston// ye shes lha yang skrag
301a4(pha): byed na// nyams pa rnams ni lta ci smos// thams cad brgyal zhing rengs par byed// ye nas khro ba rab bsngags pa'o// khro tshul ya na lag bcas pa /
301a5(pha): no// gar dgu'i nyams dang bcas pa ste// mgo dang yan lag mang po yis// so sor las byed 'phrin las skyong // de ltar khro dgu gang ma ya
301a6(pha): lus stobs ldan zhing yan lag rags// so dang mche ba rab tu rno// kha gdangs mig bgrad khro gnyer bsdus// smin ma ag+na tsom me ltar 'bar// rkang lag
301a7(pha): sen mo lcags kyur gug/ sba dang ba spu mtshon char gzings// dpa' rtags dur khrod chas rnams dang // dar dang rin chen du mas spras// me
301b1(pha): dpung 'bar ba'i klong na 'gyi nga // lu sA la sprul pa du ma 'gyed// / zhi ba la ni rnam pa lnga// ye nas zhi dang gnas skabs zhi// gdul bya'i
301b2(pha): don du zhi ba dang // rnam 'gyur stobs kyis zhi ba dang // mngon par 'phags pa'i zhi ba'o// de yang ye nas zhi ba ni// gdod nas skye ba me
301b3(pha): pa'i klong // thugs rje kun snang nyi 'od bad la// chags bral nyon mongs rlung gis 'jil// rgyan dang cha lugs rnams ma nges// rol ba'i stabs
301b4(pha): kyis bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gnas skabs zhi ba ni// mdzes shing yid 'ong rgyan gyis smras// gzhon sha chags shing bag dang ldan// kun don
301b5(pha): ye shes spyan rab mdzes// gdul bya'i don du zhi ba ni// sprul pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// ye shes snang ba la mA mer ston// gang la gang 'dul
301b6(pha): mdzad pa mdzad// rnam 'gyur stobs kyis zhi ba ni// thams cad yongs la khyab par brtse// log spyod byams pa'i thugs kyi sa 'dul// nye ri zhe
301b7(pha): kun dang mthun par ston// mngon par 'phags pa'i zhi ba ni// tshad med bzhi yi spyang thag can// bdal ba chen por kun la snyoms//
302a1(pha): thang lhod skyo dub med pa'o// kun kyang cha lugs rgyan rnams ni// 'jam mnyen dar gyi cod pa na dang // stod g.yogs smad dkris 'ja'
302a2(pha): snum ris// spyi gtsug mthon kau rin chen tog/ rtse bra na prog zhu pa tra can// mgur chu snyan yod 'khor lo risA// phyag zhabs dpung rgyun sdug gus dkris//
302a3(pha): se mo do dang do shal can// sna tshogs rin chen 'phra rnams kyis// stod smad sku ye rgyan du byas// gzhan yang rus pa'i 'phreng ba dang // sna tshogs dar gyi phro long
302a4(pha): spras/ mnyen lcug zhi sgeg 'khril ldem can// bzhengs dang bzhugs dang stang stabs kyis// skyil krung la sogs rol bar gnas// zhi ma khro yi rnam pa ni//
302a5(pha): gcig tu ma nges sna tshogs tshul// 'dzum la dar ba'i rnam pa can// khrol zhi bA'i cho 'phrul dang // sku ni zhi la rnam 'gyur khro// rnam 'gyur zhi la cha lugs khro// cha
302a6(pha): lugs zhi la stang stabs khro// spyan dang zhal gyi rnam 'gyur yAng // gcig zhi gcig khro phyed ma'i tshul// mche ba sbas pa'i so ma dngas can// bzhad nas spyan
302a7(pha): gyi rnam 'gyur khro// 'dzum zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa can// zhi zhi 'dra la khro zhing rnga ma// rnga ma rngam 'bral rab tu zhi// g.yo ba'i rnam pas rol pa ste// kun kyang
302b1(pha): sprul dang yang sprul lo// de ltar zhi dang khro ba dang // phyed ma la sogs gang dang gang // rgyan dang cha lugs dpag tu med// la la gdul bya 'dul slad dang //
302b2(pha): la la rnam rol gar gyi tshul// la la 'jug tshul tha dad de// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// nges dang ma nges de bzhin no// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro
302b3(pha): thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rgyan dang cha lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// AM// / yang 'dus sems
302b4(pha): dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsal snang ye shes lha rnams kyis// rnam 'gyur mdzad pa 'phrin las ni// phyi nang gsang ba bas ma mi khyab// dbying sna
302b5(pha): dang ye shes rnam rol las// kun rdzob tsam dang sna tshogs snang // don dam rnam nges yongs la 'dres// zhi bar mdzad dang rgyas par mdzad// de bzhin//
302b6(pha): dbang dang 'phrin las mdzad// sna tshogs las rnams dbang sgyur mdzad// gang yang dngos dang dngos min gyis// 'khor dang sprul pas gzhan don mdzad//
302b7(pha): mos pa rnams la mos snang dang // ma mos pa la'ang de dag gis// 'dul thabs cho 'phrul du ma yis// zhi dang drag dang phyed pa dang // brtse ba'i nyams kyis
303a1(pha): / dpa' brtul ston// snang mdzad rol pa ye shes sku// gcig las du mar 'gyed pa dang // de las de bzhin rim gyis spros// mang
303a2(pha): po gcig tu dril nas ni// gcig bzhin 'gro 'dul thabs kyis brtson// sa 'og sa bla sa steng dang // de dang de las gzhan pa rnams// rnam par g.yo zhing
303a3(pha): las la sbyar// 'khrug mar sna tshogs rol par ston// dpa' dang rol pa'i nyams kyis kyang // skra dang gsung dang thugs dang yang // mnyam rol sprul pas
303a4(pha): yang dang yang // rnam 'gyur mdzad pa 'phrin las kyi// lus la sku dang ngag la gsung // de bzhin sems la thugs kyi'o// rgyan gyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas//
303a5(pha): phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa grangs 'das gdul bya la// rdzas rnams du m+b+ha sna 'dul thabs ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam gnyis kyis// rtsa
303a6(pha): bau yan lag bcas pa yi// rnam 'gyur dpag tu med par yang // brda dang bcas pa'i 'phrin las rnams// char gyi rgyun bzhin 'bab par byed// dmigs
303a7(pha): pa bcas dang dmigs pa bral// phyag rgya du mar yang yang spro// kun la cha yis snyoms par 'gyur// mdor na gang yang sku dang bcas// dkyil 'khor rim
303b1(pha): pAr las kyi ni// 'jug dang 'pho ba'i rnam 'gyur la// sna tshogs las kyi cho ga 'byung // bkres pa la sogs gdung ba sel// duHkha'i gnas las de bzlog
303b2(pha): cing / mthar phyin grong mchog bgrod pa'o// bla ma ya dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rnam 'gyur mdzad pa 'phrin
303b3(pha): las bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// I// / gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa// ma yengs sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon//
303b4(pha): ye shes rol pa'i lha rnams kyi// longs spyod rgyun gyi phyug mtshan dang // de dag tshul gyi rnam 'gyur ni// gdul bya'i re 'dod skyong don du// rnam pa sna tshogs
303b5(pha): dang ldan pa// brda dang rtags kyi kun spyod de// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rgyu tham rnam pa lnga// bde gshegs mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i// gri gug ral gri dgra
303b6(pha): sta dang / mad+ma' gzhu zangs bri khro na// mdung thung su bri reg gcod dang // chu za dang ni mtshon cha yis// nyon mongs la sogs log rtog 'joms// phur
303b7(pha): bathob gtun shing dang // thod dbyig mtshon gyi phru gu dang // gnas lcags thu lum dug gi bri// marungs bdud dang ru rnga 'dul// rgyu ma sprul dang rdo rje yi// zhags
304a1(pha): pas dug gsum 'ching bar byed// bum pa lhung bzed gter gyi sgom// pad phor rin chen gzhong pa dang // pad+ma ra ga'i ga'u dang //
304a2(pha): b+han d+ha skam rlon snod chen po// dngos grub rnam gnyis bcud char 'bebs// rgyal mtshan zhing dbyug mthong gshol dang // ba dan zhing gi rgyal mtshan dang // rnga
304a3(pha): yab be con khram shing ste// dpa' rtags nyon mongs g.yulA rgyalnga rtags// rnga dang g+han+de cang te'u dang // thod rdzas chos gsung sgra sgrog byed// po te ut+pa la rin
304a4(pha): chen 'phreng // sman gyi sdong po mu tog 'phreng // me lang yid bzhi nar 'dod skong // nyi zla ri rab me dpung 'brar// chos 'byung rlung dang me thabs kyis//
304a5(pha): srid gsum gdar sha gcod par byed// sdig pa mi ro khrag gi phur pa phor// lcags spyang rus sbal thog ser tsit+ta dang // lcags kyi pi ru na'u le'i rkyal pa ste//
304a6(pha): dregs pa las 'khol ma rung 'joms pa'i rtags// me tog bdug spos mu ra ma dri// zhal zas sgra dbyangs lha rnams kyi// dgyes pa bskor zhing mchod

304b5(pha): / sprul pa'i 'khor rnams gus par nyon// ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor du// dpa' bo yab kyi rnam rol ni// thabs kyi ye shes tshul bstan pa//

312b3(pha): shugs las 'byung // steng nas 'og tu rnam par rgyal// sa 'og spyod dang de bzhin du// 'og nas steng du rnam spyod pa// mkha' spyod ga don mi za bar 'grub//
312b4(pha): rang las gzhan dang gzhan las rang // gnyis ka lhan cig nyid grub byed// rigs dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang // gnas dang gnas bzang la spyod de// skad
312b5(pha): cig la bgrod lhun gyis grub// ci 'dodas la cig chod du// nges pa'i gdeng dang bcas pas bgrod// rtsu ba dang ne yan lag dang // nyin lag lag phran
312b6(pha): bcas pa yang // bsam 'phel yang dag gdod nas rig/ pha rol dman par gyuru rnams kyang // skad cig tu ni bdag nyid dang // lha na cig 'bras bu//
312b7(pha): brnyes pa yin// yang dag bsam don gang yin pa// 'di yis sbyor ro 'dus po'i 'khor// rnam rol yid gnyis bral ba yis// nges par can du'ang //
313a1(pha): 'dis 'gyur ro// ya pa'i gnas rnams rgyub kyis phyogs// gnas skabs thun mong la brten nas// mthur thug mchog la yang dag/
313a2(pha): reg/ shugs kyi yan lag glang yin yang // thogs pa med par zang thal lo// sgo dang skur pa dang bral zhing // ngo mtshar bstod pa'i gnas su 'gyur//
313a3(pha): mtshan dang da byed 'bar ba yi// sku ya yon tan thams cad kyang // g.yel ba med par myur du myong // de bzhin gsung dang thugs mchog gi/ yon
313a4(pha): ta na ma lus 'di sr-i rtsol byed// e ma 'di sa ni bsam mtha' yas// legs pa sde kha nas nyes pa bsgrub// bla med la sogs don 'bras rnams//
313a5(pha): rang babs lhun gyis grub pa'o// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las ye shes kyi nye bar bsgrub pa'i dgos pa bstan pa'i
313a6(pha): le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// I// // yang 'dus sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// lha grub yon tan 'bras bu ni// gang gis btsu
313a7(pha): pa'i skyes bu de'i// lus nyid lha ru gyur nas kyang // tha ma pa la sogs mngon zhe na bral// gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis gyur pas// gzhan don ma brtsam
313b1(pha): lhun gyis grub// ngag kyang yang dag sngags kyi sgra// 'khrul pa'i gtam zung zad nas kyang // bla med chos kyi sgra sgrogs pas// mi snyan bral nas kun tu/
313b2(pha): yang / snyan cing don+da mthun yang dag ldan// sgra yi dbang po chos kyi dbyangs// 'brel dang bcas pas rab sgrogs shing // kun tu yang dag go phyed
313b3(pha): pa'o// tAdamyal dang yi dgas dud 'gro dang // mi dang lha min lhar gyur pa// so so'i skad du 'di nges nas// chos kyi sa rnam par grol byed pa// 'idra/
313b4(pha): nyid las ni yang dag 'byung // gnas skabs mthar thug don 'bras brnyes// yid kyang de bzhin 'khrul sangs nas// mkhyen dang brtse ba'i rang bzhin
313b5(pha): gyis/ g.yo ba med pa'i 'gro don spyod// gcig la nges gtad mi mnga' zhing // mkha' ltar yongs la khyab pa yis// gang dang gang la de dang de//
313b6(pha): dgongs pas yongs khyab smin pa dang // grol ba nyid du yang dag nges// bla ma lha dang mkha' 'gro yi// nus pa'i stobs gang 'dir 'dus byed// mdor
313b7(pha): na lus ngag yid gsum po// sku gsum dkyil 'khor nyid gyur pas// sku gsum zhing du sbyor bar byed// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan pas// bgrad
314a1(pha): pa gcig pa'i lam che na bzhugs// phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes brnyes// de sngogs yon tan 'bras bu'i rigs// rab 'bring tra
314a2(pha): ma'i tshul du ste// yang mtha' nyid las gzhan pa yis// rtsal chen grub par mi 'gyur ro// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams da kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo
314a3(pha): las ye shes kyi lha bsgrubs pas grub pa'i yon tan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// I// // yang 'dus
314a4(pha): sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sgyu ma bsgrubs pa'i ny+dzaswa pA ni// mchog don ye shes ci smos// gnas skab sku lam gyi 'char tshul yang // yin
314a5(pha): gnyis bral ba 'byung mi srid// thabs dang bral ba'i re b+hi ni// 'dab gshog chag pa'i mkha'i lding bzhin// dmigs pa'i gnas su skyel mi nus//
314a6(pha): phyi nang snod bcud phung po kun// phung po nyid tu gyur nas kyang // 'dod chags la sogs las la spyod// 'khrulnga zhing 'khor nas 'khor bar 'khor//
314a7(pha): 'bras bu lha mi'i nye lam tsam// smin pa'i dbang du gyur nas kyang // don gyis smos pa ma yin no// las kyi rtog sgrib 'thab pa'i mthu// zug rngu
314b1(pha): dang bcas yang yang myong // skye shi la sogs rba rlabs rnams// drag tu g.yo zhing 'khor mar 'khor// lus kyi khung nas de mi tho na// lha dang sngags
314b2(pha): kyis ma zin pa'i// skyes bu yang dag skye sa bu min// las kyi zhags pas dam bcings nas// las kyi kha rgyud yang dang yang // 'khrul pa'i lus
314b3(pha): rgyud du 'khor// nyes las rnam par grol min+da zhing // gdan las 'phags par mi 'gyur sogs// lha me nyes pa brjod mtha' yas// bla ma yi
314b4(pha): dom mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shal gyi ri bo las ye shes kyi sgyu ma bsgrubs pa'i nyes pa bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu bdun pa'o// ste/
314b5(pha): / dbang po dran 'dzin 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lho bsgrub brtson pa'i bu// phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di lta ste// gnas ni rab 'jig dur
314b6(pha): khrod gleng // dus ni yar tshes bzang po'i tshe// lus ngag yid gsum brtson ldan pas// dkyil 'khor la sogs rdzas bkram zhing // sngon 'gro dngos
314b7(pha): gzhi rjes dang bcas// lha gsal sngags dang bcas te bsgrub// rtags dang mtshan mas gtan la dbab// dad gdungs 'du shes skyes nas ni//
315a1(pha): rang rgyud du la na grub pa ste// dngos grub blang sogs las la sbyar// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyu dang shel gyi ri bo
315a2(pha): la sa ye shes gyi lha phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// I// // yang 'dzin bstan pa'i 'khor rnam
315a3(pha): nyon/ nang ltar ye shes lha bsgrub ni// bdag lus lha yi dkyil 'khor gsal// yengs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// skye me dang shub bu'i bzlas pa
315a4(pha): 'bad/ tarang snang rtog tshogs gtor mchod 'bu la// gsal snang dag pas gtan la phag/ snang srid sgyu mar sharA ba na// ye shesu lha nyid grub pa ste// ting
315a5(pha): 'dzin 'phro 'di'i las sbyor brtsam// gang la dmigs pa gnas su bskyod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi
315a6(pha): lha nang ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// A~M// 'dus shing tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsang ba
315a7(pha): bu gyi bskum pa'i// thabs kyi ma pa 'di sa kyi// ma rgan ngomi chen pa'i dkyil lakhor du// rangags la 'di kyi lta bab sasheg/ b+hU gyi me
315b1(pha): bzlas pa bya// chu nga rgyun gyi rnal 'byor lnga// g.yos pa med par bsgrubs pa yis// bdag gis bdag nyid gtan lnga phebs// 'pho 'gyur med na grub pa ste//
315b2(pha): gang shar rol pa'i laswa sbyor bya// snang srid gzhi bzhengs chen por 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi bo las/ ye shes kyi lha
315b3(pha): gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// I// sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ma yengs nyon// de bzhin nyid du
315b4(pha): lha bsgrub pa'i// man ngag thabs kyi rgyal po bstan// rang snang dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rtsol bral chen po'i lha bkod de// 'byung 'jug rlung gi bzlas pa 'bad/
315b5(pha): shugs 'byung rang babs bsgrub la brtson// 'khrul pA dag nas lha 'grub pa snga// blang dor bral ba'i lngas sbyor bya// 'khor 'das gnyis mnyam ro gcig 'gyur//
315b6(pha): bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha de nyid ltar bsgrub pa'i tshu lo bston pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// I/
315b7(pha): dbang po sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// lha mchod thugs dam bskang ba na// phyi ltar thun mong rdzas kyis mchod// nang ltar dbang po rnam lngas
316a1(pha): mchod// gsang ba rtog tshogs rig pas mchod// de nyid spros bral dgongs pas mchod// bde stong ro mnyam dbyings su bskang // snang
316a2(pha): srid gzhi bzhengs chen po'i klong // blang dor bral bar thugs dam bskang // bskang bya ba skang byed bskang ba'i yul// mnyam nyid rol pa chen por bskang // de ltar
316a3(pha): thugs dam bskang bA yis// 'bras bu mchog dang thu na mong kun// ye shes lha dgyes stsol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo
316a4(pha): las ye shes kyi lha mchod cing thugs dam bskang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// s+t+waM// // rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnam
316a5(pha): nyon// bdag nyid lha b+he 'di lta ste// gzhir gnas ye shes dbang po yis// stong 'og phyogs bcur mi lta zhing // nang du bkug la a ra la gtad// phung po khams
316a6(pha): dang skye mched kun// ye shes lha yi rol pa ste// ma skyes rang gsal lam me ba// thugs rje zhal phyag rgyan dang bcas// rang babs lhug par bzhugs pa la//
316a7(pha): dad pa'i dbang pos gsal gdab pa// snang ba yab la stong pa yum// gnyis med zung 'jug chen po'i dbyings// gsal 'grib 'pho 'gyur med par lta// ngo bo
316b1(pha): bla mar gnas pa la// rang bzhin yid ma lha skur du zhengs// thugs rmyi 'gag med mkha' 'gror snang // bdag nyid las min lha med pas// me grub babs su
316b2(pha): thug bcad// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ bdag nyid ye shes kyi lhar gsal ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//
316b3(pha): I// / dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma yengs nyon// mdun du ye shes lha bskyed na// pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgra
316b4(pha): bzhi rta babs bcas// tshang khang 'od kyi dra bas sbrel// sgrub g.yog med par phyi nang gsal// rang bzhin 'od lnga 'khrig pa'i dbus// sa bon yig 'bru phyag
316b5(pha): mtshan las// mngon par lhag pa'i m+WA r+ya NAM zhing // gar+b+ha byA 'khar gyi gsum thagyur las// yang 'khor de yi byed de gsal// rgyun dang ma lugs rnam par bag/
316b6(pha): ngo bo bla ma chos sku la// rang bzhin yi dam longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje sprul sku mkha' 'gro ma// rnam grangs dam tshig rdzogs par gsal// snang la rang
316b7(pha): bzhin ma grub par// 'od dang 'od zer 'phro 'dur btsas// rang snang dag pas gsal bar bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las
317a1(pha): mdun bskyed ye shes kyi lha b+hai tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// I// // rang byung sems dpa'i 'khor
317a2(pha): rnams nyon// dam tshig sems dpa'i ngo bo ni// mos bsgyur blo yi bskyed pa ste// rkang grangs mtshan dang bcas pa dang // gtso bo nyid dang de yi yum//
317a3(pha): 'khor dang de yi yang 'khor dang // so so'i tshom bur bcas nas ni// tshom bu dgu ru rnam par nges// spyi bo la sogs gnas rnams su'ang // oM sogs
317a4(pha): yi ge 'bru rnams bkra// sngon gyi rjes bzung mtha' tshig ltar// dam tshig dbang gis bskyed rnams so// rung las byung zhing rang nyid dang // dam
317a5(pha): gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bro las lha dam tshig pa bstan pa'i le'u
317a6(pha): ste nyer lnga pa'o// I// / rang shar sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba// gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku//
317a7(pha): rang byung rang gsal longs spyod rdzogs// shar grol sprul sku 'gro ba 'dul// rang bab byin brlabs bla ma mchog/ dngos grub gshegs gter yi dam lha/
317b1(pha): 'phrin las rmad byung mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// snang ba'i rang bzhin yab kyi cha// stong pa bdag med yum mchog ste// ma nyam par gnas pa zhi ba'i sku// hur
317b2(pha): phur thol skyes khro skur bzhengs// rol pa ye shes zhi ma khro// de dag gdod nas lhun gyis grub// byas bcos byung ba de ma yin// ye nas shes rig rgyal por snang
317b3(pha): de phyir ye shes sems dpa'a'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyu dang zhal gyi ri bo la sau/ lha ye shes sems dpa'i bzhugs tshul bstan pa'i le'u

317b5(pha): bsre ba'i tshul// chu la chu bzhag ji bzhin dang // de bzhin nyi ma 'od kyi tshul// phan tshun tha dad ma yin par// dbyer med du ma ro gcig nyid// yin par shes
317b6(pha): shing yin tshul du// rnal 'byor rgyal po rnams kyis lta// bsre bya sre byed med pa dang // gzhag bya bzhag byed med pa ste// 'on kyang gnas skabs yul don du//

318a1(pha): thabs kyi yan lag ste// gdul bya 'gro ba 'dren phyir spros// kun kyang yang dag dgongs don spyod// cho ga'i yan lag ji bzhin pa//
318a2(pha): sprul pa rnams kyis spro bar gyis// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa bsre ba'i tshul bstan
318a3(pha): pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// I// / gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs nyon// dam tshig ye shes sems dpa' gnyis// dbang bskur
318a4(pha): rgyu yis 'di ltar gdab/ rnam snang mi bskyod 'od dpag med// ren 'byung don+da yod grub pa ste// rigs rnams kun gyi gtso bo mchog/ sangs rgyas ma
318a5(pha): bdag rigs kyi lhas// ji ltar snang ba'i rigs rnams la// rgyal thab sna spyi blugs rang dbang bskur// dag pa gsum gyis rgyas gdab pas// 'bras bu
318a6(pha): sku lnga ye shes lnga// phung khams skye mched gnas dag nas// rang rang rigs kyis dbu brgyan te// rigs bdag bdag po nyid kyis mtshan// dpag med la sogs/
318a7(pha): de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur rgyas gdab mtshon pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha dang rol pa cig
318b1(pha): pa'i dbyings su dbang bskur rgyas gdab tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// I// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// de/
318b2(pha): ltar bstan pa'i lha rnams kyi// rgyu mtshan rnam grangs dpag med kyang // gcig tu dril nas don ston pa// snod kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa// sgyu ma lus nyid gnas
318b3(pha): dag phyir// bzhugs gnas pho brang gzhal yas bstan// bcud kyi sems can gnas dag cing // sem sA nyid lha ru ga nas gyur pas// ye shes lha yi rnam pa
318b4(pha): bstan// gdul bya sbyin grol lam dgod phyir// ye shes bla ma'i ngo bor bstan// dgos 'dod re ba bskong ba'i phyir// yi dam zhi dang khro bor bstan// 'phrin las
318b5(pha): dmigs su bsgyur ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro'i rol pa chen por bstan// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel phun tshogs phyir// de ltar 'phro 'du sna tshogs bstan// rtsa rlung /
318b6(pha): thig le'i ngo bo yang // gr-i zhal ya sa lha dang bcas par bstan// phung po kham sa dang skye mched rnams// rang byung ye shes lha yi dang // ye shes rab rdzogs sku lnga'i zhing //
318b7(pha): spros bral lhun grub phyag rgya'i zhing // gzhir snang dag pas chos kyi dbyings// lhag med nyid du mya ngan 'da'// sgra dang 'od du bcas nas kyang // sku gsum zhing du mngon byung ba
319a1(pha): gdul bya rnams la lhag mar bcas// sku gdung ring bsrel bzhag nas kyang // gzhan phan thabs kyis 'gro ba rnams// rims kyis 'dren par des
319a2(pha): byed do// yang tha bar do nyid du yang // rang snang ye shes lha dang 'phrad// rang ngo shes nas rnam par grol// de yang rgyu 'bras de yi yin// sprul pa las kyang sprul pa'i sku// /
319a3(pha): sku dang mtshan dpe sa rab spras shing // las dag zhing la rab snang bas// byang chub mngon du de 'gyur zhing // de sogs dpal dang yang dag ldan// spyi phud nyid du snang
319a4(pha): bar byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo la sa/ ye shes kyi lha bsgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// m+me//
319a5(pha): / de ltar 'khor gyis zhus pa'i don// dpag med rgyal pos rab gsungs pa// sems dpa' gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // sgra yi rdo rje dri rdo rje/
319a6(pha): ro dang reg bya'i rdo rje dang // sems dpa' chos kyi rdo rje sogs// gdul byar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshim par byed pa'i don gsungs pa// dga' zhing mgunas
319a7(pha): thal mo sbyar// rangs pa'i sems kyis spyi bos 'dud// lha dang mi dang lha min dang // klu dang rig sngags 'chang la sogs// 'jig rten pa rnams yi rang zhing //
319b1(pha): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste sum cu
319b2(pha): pa'o// m+b+hi/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis sprul pa reng shar
319b3(pha): du babs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shel gyi ri bo rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// sU mA yA/ rgya rgya rgya/ bdag 'dra pad+ma
319b4(pha): b+h+ya gnas/ sgo nga 'gyur du bag pa'o// sa sa rgyas mi du gi sgonas brtson pas/
319b5(pha): bu la ba shus s+ho// / ru sUn+da dza mA shAt+ya thA/ u rgyan+da gsang ba brda'i skad du bstan pa/ rgya gar skad du/
319b6(pha): gu ru de wa DA kin+di sarba wa ka tran tra/ rad na b+hi b+hA na ma/ blod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'du
319b7(pha): chos gsung smra ba'i dbang po gzi brjid kyi rgyal po mthe'i yas pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par rgyan bkod mdzes pa yis// pho brang gzhal yas brtsegs pa na// mdzes byed rma bya'o khri
320a1(pha): stengs su// ston pa dpag med rgyal po dang // dpa' mo bde sbyor mnyam bzhugs nas// dgongs pa chen por bzhugs pa'i tshe//
320a2(pha): nyid kyi sprul pa las byung ba'i// bde bar rol pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad gsol// e ma ston pa bcom ldan 'das// mi mnyam
320a3(pha): pa dang mnyam pa dang // yang dag ljags kyi pad+mo las// mnyam dbyangs chen po'i dpal mnga' ba// g.yangs chen po gcod mdzad cing // sngags kyi sprin char
320a4(pha): 'bebs pa po// brtse ba'i thugs kyis 'dir dgongs shig/ ye shes dbyings kyi lha rnams kun// nye bar sgrub par byed pa la// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod rnams
320a5(pha): nges pa'i don du sbrul du gsol// de yang sngags kyi nga ba dang // nges tshig dbye ba rnam grangs dang // sngags dngos bgrang tshul bsnyen pa'i tshang // drod rtags
320a6(pha): drang nI bzlas pa'i tshad// dag dang ma dag skyon yon dang // sngags kyi bsgrub tshul rim pa rnams// ljags kyi dbang pos bkram nas kyang // bdag cag
320a7(pha): yid kyi 'dod pa rnams// dus 'dir skong bar mdzad du gsol// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yi//
320b1(pha): mchog don bsgrub 'dod rnal 'byor pas/ ye shes lha dang dbyer med du// bsre bar 'dod na sngagasal brtson// sngags pa sngags la mi brtson pa// sems kyi
320b2(pha): re ba skong mi 'gyur// gang gis sngags la brtson byed na// sngags kyi ngo bo ngos zin gces// de bzhin sngags kyi nges tshig kyang // gnad du che bas shes pa gces// sngags
320b3(pha): kyi dbye ba ma shes na// rang gis rang nyid 'ching bar 'gyur// rnam grangs ma shes sngags zlo ba/ mun nag thom 'gros byed dang mtshungs// sngags dngos ngo yis ma zin
320b4(pha): ni// sol ba gser du sgrub dang mtshungs// sngags kyi bgrang tshul ma shes na// mtshon mad g.yul du badrug dang mtshungs// bsnyen tshad gtan la ma phebs na// na dngos
320b5(pha): mu zin sman pa 'dra// sngags bzlas drod rtags ma shes na// tshod med mda' rgyang 'phan pa 'dra// sngags kyi skyon yon ma shes na// dug dang 'dres pa'i zas za 'dra// sngags
320b6(pha): kyi sgrub tshul ma shes na// long bas long khrid byed pa 'dra// des na de dag rim po rnams// shes par gyur pa'i sngags pa yis// lha bskyed sngags la 'bad pa na// stobs dang
320b7(pha): nus pa bsam mi khyab// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i longs spyod kun// sngags la
321a1(pha): / brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten longs spyod smos ci dgos// des na snang srid 'khor 'das kyi// cho 'phrul nus stobs sngags kyis byed/
321a2(pha): sngags kyi nus stobs bsam mtha' yas// de phyir sngags pa sngags la brtson// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyad rin chen 'brug sgra las// gleng
321a3(pha): gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// s+thi// // rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha rnams bsgrub pa la// snying po sngags kyi ngo bo bstan//
321a4(pha): yengs 'khrul med par yid kyis zung // ye shes lha sngags ngo bo dang // 'jig rten lha sngags ngo bo ste// ye shes lha sngags la yang gsum//
321a5(pha): bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro ste// bla ma bla na gnyan pa'i gtso// spyi phud dkon mchog rin chen pas// yongs kyi thog mar 'byung bas gces// de dag
321a6(pha): sngags kyi ngo bo ni// gdung bas gsol ba gdab pa'i don// brjod pa sngags su 'byung ba ste// ngo bo g.yel ba mi mnga' bar// rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'o// yi dam zhi
321a7(pha): dang khro bo dang // zhi ma khro dang rnam pa gsum// zhi ba g.yo med ting nge 'dzin// khyab gdal chen por kun la spro// 'di bsgrub tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir 'gyur// ngo bo 'gyur
321b1(pha): med dgongs pa'i klong // yengs 'khrul bral bar bsngags pa'o// khro bo rngam byed reb gtum pa// rdo rje 'bar ba ma rungs 'joms// 'di bsgrubs 'byung po la sogs pa//
321b2(pha): ma rungs pa rnams skrag cing byer// ngo bo rtsub khro gtum pa ste// gnod byed dgra bgegs gnyen por sngags// zhi khro las rnams yongs kyi bdag/ zhi bar 'dod
321b3(pha): la zhi ba dang // de bzhin khro bar 'dod la khro// gang yang rgyas par byed pa dang // dbang mdzad dbang gi rgyal po ste// drag pos rab tu drag par byed// ngo bo gang la yang
321b4(pha): 'jug pa ste// sna tshogs las la bsngags pa'o// de ltar zhi dang khro la sogs// yi dam lha yi sa bon dang // snying pa sngags su 'byung ba'i phyir// sngags kyi
321b5(pha): yang dag brjod// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi ngo bo ni// srog gnad dag nas bskul nas kyang // 'phrin las dmigs su bskul byas te// bka' nyan gus phyi rab sngags
321b6(pha): pa'o// las byed pho nya bran gyi tshul// gang dang grang la 'jug byed pa// de dang de yi las la bsngags// drag byed gtu ma dang drag byed rnga ma// gang yang mkha' 'gro
321b7(pha): shugs kyis 'gro// srog yig gnad nas bos pa'i tshe// dam tshig dbang gis dbang med du// de phyir 'gugs dang 'khri ba dang // 'du 'bral med par 'grogs
322a1(pha): pa dang / bka' nyan las la bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten lha sngags ngo bo la// phye dang nang dang gsang ba ste// phyi ltar snang srid//
322a2(pha): lha 'dre rnams// gnad nas bskul zhing las la rbad// dbang med bran du bkol ba'i phyir// gnad 'bebs dag tu bsngags pa'o// nang lta ru dregs pa sde brgyad
322a3(pha): rnams// dpal gyi pho nya las mkhan du// gnyer gtad gang dmigs gnas su rgyug/ dam la gnas phyir srog nas 'dren// dam la gnas phyir bsngags pa'o//
322a4(pha): gsang ba rnal 'byor rang nyid dang // lhan cig dag tu skyes nas kyang // rtag tu 'bral med 'grogs byed cing // bsrung dang mgon skyobs byed pa dang // gnod cing 'tshe
322a5(pha): bar byed pa rnams// bsgral zhing bzlog pa'i mthu dpung can// de dag g.yel bar mi byed cing // da ma la gnas nas bka' bzhin bsgrub// gnyer ga tad las byed bran du
322a6(pha): 'gyur// 'dzin pa'i lcags kyu bya ba'i phyir// ming dang srog nas 'bod cing bsgrub// gzer du gdab phyir bsngags pa'o// mdor ni sngags kyi ngo bo zhes// ming dang
322a7(pha): srog nas drang byas te// da ma la gonas par byed pa dang // rang rang gnyen por bsngags pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/
322b1(pha): sngags kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// s+thi// / gzugs sgra la sogs 'dus pa'i 'khor// bla ma yi da mA mkha' 'gro yi//
322b2(pha): sngags kyi ngas tshig bstan gyis nyon// bla ma'i sngags kyi nges tshig ni// thugs rje skul bar byed pa'o// yi dam sngags kyi nges tshig ni// dngos grub
322b3(pha): skul bar byed pa'o// mkha' 'gro sngags kyi nges tshig ni// las la mngag par byed pa ste// gang dang gang gi srog sngags rnams// bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// dngos
322b4(pha): su thong dang cho 'phrul ston// rtags dang mtshan ma mngon bstan nas// 'dod pa'i don gang grub pas na// bzlas pa sngags kyi nges tshig yin// ming dang srog gi yi ge
322b5(pha): dang / mtha' bsgyur las kyi yi ge dang // log gnon gnad kyi yi ge rnams// bzlas dang bris dang bcangs la sogs// gang dang gang byas de dang de'i// las grub sngags
322b6(pha): kyi nges pa'i tshig/ don rab dbye bas shes par bya// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
322b7(pha): pa'o// skr-i// / sprul sras 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi dbye ba bstan par bya//
323a1(pha): bla ma'i mtshan nas 'bod pa dang // thugs srog gnad nas bskul ba dang // dam tshig gnyen po bsten pa dang // dgyes pa skong bar byed
323a2(pha): pa'i sngags// bla ma'i mtshan nas 'bod pa'i sngags// sgra den sngags kyi 'gyur dbyangs su// sang kr-i ta yi skad las drangs// g+hu ru ma hA b+h+yo d+hi sogs
323a3(pha): rang rang mtshan spel smos pa'am// rang rang bod skad la sogs kyis// gdung bas 'bod cing mtshan nas drangs// mos gus bskyed de gsol ba gdab// byin rlabs

323a7(pha): dam tshig gnyen pos bstan pa'i sngags// sA mA yA las drangs nas kyang // g+hu ru'i skad kyis 'tshams sbyar ta// o dang swA hA'i thems su bzhugs// dam tshig
323a8(pha): gnyen pos rjes dgongs shing // don 'bras myur du stsol bar 'gyur// dgyes pa skong bar byed pa'i sngags// tshig do ni ngag gi 'gyur skad las// gdungs shing
323b1(pha): snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bya// bstod sngags la sogs gang shis kyis// brda dang rtags kyis go nas bya// de dag gis ni rab dgyes pas// bdag gi 'dod
323b2(pha): pa'i don 'bras 'grub// de yang hU hriHgdangs dang ni// e ma hoHla sogs pa yi// 'dren dang bcas pa shis pa yin// mdor na bla ma'i mtshan smos pa//
323b3(pha): bod kyi skad dang rgya gar skad// gnod srog yi ge 'bru gsum pos// rgyas gdab 'dren dang bcas par brjod// dad dang ldan par sus brtson pa// bla ma'i sku
323b4(pha): gsung thugs dang ni// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum po// dbyer med gyur nas nus stobs mnyam// rang gzhan don 'bras ci 'dod pa// myur du 'grub phyir
323b5(pha): shes pas 'bad// yi dam sngags kyi dbye ba yang // spyi dang bye brag rnam mang zhing // spyir ni srog sngags mtshan sngags dang // dam tshig sdigs
323b6(pha): dang las kyi sngags// las la 'jug pa'i sngags dang ni// nges med dmod spel smon lam sngags// srog sngags rang rang sa bon las// bsgyur byed ni
323b7(pha): ge dbyangs gsal can// gnad la dbab par byed rnams yin// de yang o dang hUM phaT kyi// them la bzhugs nas 'dren pa'o// mtshan sngags d+he wa zhes pa'om//
324a1(pha): lha yi mtshon byed mtshan gyis drangs// sang kri ta yi skad las drangs// thog mthu' can gyi them la bzhugs// dam tshig sngags kyi mtshan

324a3(pha): yang yang ar la gtad pa ga na da// las la 'jug par byed pa la// sngags mthar b+h+yo dang rbad dza ge dgas// hI hring dung dung gnad nas bskul// rgya ga rgyag
324a4(pha): breng breng bcas pa ste// mtha' can rdzogs pa las 'jug sngags// myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// nges med dmod mo sbrel tshig dang // smon lam mtha'
324a5(pha): bsgyur bcas pa'i sngags// 'di dag dam chog cha la rtogs// las myur brda yi sngags yin pas// gang 'dod gdags pa gnad yin zhing // go rims ma log ga ces//
324a6(pha): pa yin// mdor na yid la dam byed pa// spang blang med pa'i gnad dang ni// dam tshig dag las ma g.yos na// yi dam myur 'grub bsam gtan 'phel//
324a7(pha): bye brag yi dam lha yi sngags// gang la dmigs pa'i lha rnams kyi// rtsa sngags so sor nor 'khrul med// srog 'dren dang ni mtshan sngags te// bskyed pa'i sa bon la sogs
324b1(pha): pa/ kang yan sor bzhag dam du bcang // mdor na spyir dral rtsa ba dang // yan lag bcas pa 'di lta ste// o AHhU hrIr+the badz+ra g+hu ru pad+ma sa d+ha d+he wa DA ki ni b+ho te tsit+ta/ ma hA su
324b2(pha): khA badz+ra ma hA kro ta shan+ti ka/ hri ma ha ri ni sa ra tsi hIHya sa rba sid+hi// ka ya lpa ka tsit+ta/ dz+nyA na sa twa/ a mi d+he waHme maM tsit+ta/ sa ma b+ha wa a d+hiSh+Ta nan/ ma ma a yu dz+nyA na/
324b3(pha): sid+hi pha la hUM swA hA/ dper na da 'dra'i tshul gyis ni// las 'gra ba s+phi ra dri la yin pa'i phyir// chu rgyun lta bur 'bad pa'i don// yang sras se mes kyi gding 'chang ba//
324b4(pha): bde legs yon tan spel bar byed// rang rang snying po mtshan don bcas// thog mtha' dbu zhabs tham la bzhugs// de ni yang dag gdams pa'o// de sogs bye

324b7(pha): par byed// dmod par bcas pa'i sngags 'byung bas// bar tshig 'bral par las la spar// phyi rol pa dang nang pa yi// khyad par mgo 'jug gnyis las 'byung // nga'o//

328a7(pha): las/ rang babs gshis kyis gtan la dbab// sgra grags sngags kyi rol pa las// lhun grub rang brtsal 'bras bu smin// rtsol dang bral ba'i bzlas pa yis//

328b7(pha): gcad/ rang sems chos sku bla mar lta// 'byung 'jug gnas gsum rlung la bslab// tha ma la'ang ngag gi smra brjod spang // phung khams skye mched lhar shes pas//
329a1(pha): / brjod pa sngags kyi rang slar grol// oM sogs sngags 'bru yid la bkram/ dus kyis mtshams gcad du med// bdag lus 'byung
329a2(pha): pa'i grong khyer ni// ye byung mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul nyid// kun 'byung klong las rang sgra sngags// ngag yid 'khrul pa gnas nas zad// de ni gsang ba'i bsgrang tshul
329a3(pha): te/ de dag gang gis brtson pa yis// skyes bu tha mal las sad nas// 'bras bu mchog la myur du reg/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang nyid nas// 'khrul pa med pa'i ting
329a4(pha): 'dzin gsal// yengs pa med par bzlas sngags 'grub// gtang bzhag med pa nus pa smin// lus nyid lha la ngag nyid sngags// yid chos 'pho 'gyur med par
329a5(pha): grol kha bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi bgrang tshul bla na med// 'bras bu ye grub gdeng chen rnyed// bgrang tshul phyi nang gsang gsum dang // da nyid
329a6(pha): sngags kyi bgrang tshul las// g.yo med don chen 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'bru ga sgra las// sngag
329a7(pha): kyi bgrang tshul bstan pa'i la ru ste bdun pa'o// s+ho// / yang sprul sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha sngags bsnyen
329b1(pha): pa'i tshad// bstan phyir ma yengs gus pas nyon// gtso 'khor dang ni sprul pa dang // yang sprul rnams kyi bsnyen tshad dang // grangs kyi tshad dang dus kyi
329b2(pha): tshad/ rtags kyi tshad dang rnam pa gsum// grangs tshad gang yin gtso bo yi// snying po dag la 'bru 'bum ste// ming don sngags las de bzhin
329b3(pha): las/ sa bon srog sngags da bcu 'gyur// 'khor gyi bsnyen pa 'bum khri ste// las kyi sngags la de las 'gyur// gnyis dang gsum sogs las dang bstun//
329b4(pha): rang gnad 'khor gyi srog sngags la'ang // khri las lnga 'gyur bzlas pas 'grub// 'on kyang sngags dang rnal 'byor gyi// dgra grogs khams dang bstun pa yi//
329b5(pha): grogs 'phrad 'bring la nang phrad ra ba// dgra dang phrad pa tha ma ste// de yi 'gyur tshul mkhas pas dpyad// ra ba la rkyang ma 'bring khug pa// tha ma dag ni spang ba 'am//
329b6(pha): yang na 'don pa bsgyur bas 'grub// pha rol dgra la rang nyid grogs// de ni rab tu spang ba gces// rang nyid dgra la pha rol grogs// de byung bsnyen par rung tsam
329b7(pha): las// yang dag 'bras bu 'gyangs par 'gyur// sprul pa la ni ma nges la// yang sprul de bas nges pa med// la la gtso bo nyid dang mnyam// la la brgya stong las
330a1(pha): 'grub pa'ang srid// ci phyir sprul pa yin phyir ro// dus kyi bsnyen tshad bstan pa ni// rang rang las kyi 'phen pa dang // dus gnad
330a2(pha): 'khor dang yo byad dang // gnas kyi khyad par la sogs dang // brtson 'grus dang ni dbang po'i khyad// rab 'bring tha ma'i khyad par las// la la zhag bdun la sogs dang // de bzhin
330a3(pha): la la zla ba bdun// la la lo bdun la sogs dang // ji ltar skal ba dman pas kyang // dung phyur dag gi dus tshad las// nyin khri de bzhin mtshan khri yis// bcu gnyis lo las
330a4(pha): 'bras bu 'byung // la la bdun phrag bdun 'das nas// thun mong las kyi bya ba 'grub// de bzhin nyin zhag phrug gcig ste// skya ring kha sprod las la 'jug/ mdor na dus
330a5(pha): kyi tshad rnams la// 'pho 'jug gnas stong khyad par gyis// rten 'brel phyi nang nyid dang bsnun// phyi dus dang ni nang gis dus// rtsa dang rlung gi khyad par las// 'jug
330a6(pha): pa'i thig la grangs su bcad// de shes pa yi dus mi 'gyangs// gtso bos mchog don gter bar byed// da la dus gnad bsring bar bya// 'khor gyis thun mong las bsgrub
330a7(pha): pabs/ de las dus tshad rang tshod sbyar// yang 'khor sprul dang yang sbrul gyis// bsnyen pa'i dus tshad gzung du med// de yi mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag
330b1(pha): rtags kyi bsnyen tshad gzung ba ni// rab la dngos dang 'bring la nyams// tha ma rmi lam dag la 'byung // mchog la chos kyi sku yi rtags// 'bring la longs spyod rdzogs sku'i

330b6(pha): grangs kyi tshad la grangs tshad gzung // dus kyi tshad la dus gnad dpag/ rtags la rtags rnams ngo yis gzung // des ni bsnyen pa mthar phyin nas// sngags rnams gtan la
330b7(pha): phebs nas kyang // ye shes lha dang mjal bar 'gyur// de mnyes las kyi 'bras bu 'byung // 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha 'dre ni// ngang gis bka' nyan bran du 'gyur// bla

331b5(pha): dngos grub nye bar thob rtags ni// phyi nang gzhan rkyen 'tshe dogs med// gzhan gyi yid 'ong bkur sti dang // phu dud du ma byed pa 'byung // blo bde bags phe bas yid sman

331b7(pha): sha chags par 'gyur// mdor na rnal 'byor lus ngag yid// gtan la phebs shing yon tan 'bar// bde legs yon tan dpal dang ldan// thun mong las rnams
332a1(pha): gang brtsams 'grub// gzhan gyis sman cing yid dga' byed// tshe rol spyod pa gang spyad kyang // gnad du 'gro zhing gzhan don 'byung // rang snang chos
332a2(pha): dang mthun par 'gyur// 'jig rten longs spyod gtan rtsis bral// 'khrul pa'i bag chags ma lus sangs// zas nor longs spyod la sogs pa// mi 'dod bzhin du

333a1(pha): ya mazung // la la shub bur bzlas rgyu la// skad ngar bskyed pa'i bzlas nor dang // la la 'dzab dbyangs lta bu la// shu ba bu'i bzlas pa byed

333a3(pha): bzlas/ rig snga gos klog pa'i tshul du ste// gzungs sngags gang yang ldan pa la// de dag gsum la'ang dbye ba'i tshul// bzlas tshul yul gyi skabs dang bstan//

336b7(pha): par bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// I// // dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug gis ljags kyi dbang

337a2(pha): bya ba rdzogs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ d+ha thi/ I/ bdag 'dra u rgyan pad+mas sgra rang bsgyur du bkod pa'o// sangs rgyas gling bas bla dkaR+Sha dung gi
337a3(pha): sgo nas bton pa'o// shog ser bu la shus// skyon gsang brdi'i skad du/ sha ma swa Dam+ba b+h+rarba pra kra/ ha ny+dza// rgya gar skad du/ b+hu ru D+ha wa Da ki nas
337a4(pha): tsit+ta tAn+da tra/ ga ti ka ga mA kra nA ma/ bud skad du/ bla ma yi du ma mkho' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das tha
337a5(pha): med kyi mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba/ gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i dpal dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las thams cad yongs su
337a6(pha): rdzogs pa'i snying po g.yo ba med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing khams rnam par dag pa rgyan bkod pa'i pho brang brtsegs pa/ steng 'gro phyogs mtshams dbus la sogs//
337a7(pha): pa phyogs dang bral zhing rgya yongs su mi chad pa/ gsal la 'od 'bar zhing rnam par rab tu bkra ba/ rgyan gyis lhun pos rab tu brjid pa'i zhing / snang yul du bkra ba
337b1(pha): las kyang gzung 'dzin ngos bzung dang bral ba'i klong yangs pa chen por/ gdod nas ting nge 'dzin rnam par g.yo ba mi mnga' zhing / dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs
337b2(pha): nas/ phyogs bral gyi gdul bya la/ gsal 'grib med cing mnyam par dgongs nas/ bzod par dka' zhing ltos pa med par gzigs nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i mdzad
337b3(pha): pa bskal ba med par mdzad pa'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das yangs pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i mgon la/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i 'khor rnam par snang mdzad dang/
337b4(pha): mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'od mdzad dang / 'dod chags bral ba dang / don rab 'dzin pa lnga sogs pa rigs lnga'i sems dpa' dang / chos dbyings rdo rje ma dang
337b5(pha): gzugs rdo rje ma dang / sgra rdo rje ma dang / dri rdo rje ma dang / ro rdo rje ma dang / reg rdo rje ma ste/ rigs kyi sems ma la sogs pa/ sprul pa rang snang gi dkyil 'khor
337b6(pha): gyi rol pa la sa rab tu byung ba'i 'khor rnams kyis dus mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par byung ba rang byung dgongs pa klong gi 'od zer kun tu rnam par bkram pa'i tshe/ bcom
337b7(pha): ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ 'od zer dkar po dang / 'od zer dmar po dang / 'od zer mthing ka rab tu 'phros shing / 'khor
338a1(pha): sems dpa' sems ma rnams kyi gnas gsum du thim pa'i tshe/ sprul pa rang byung gi 'khor rnams rang snang gi dkyil 'khor las langs
338a2(pha): shing gnas lugs kyi don che ba rang la bstan pa'i don/ nam mkha' klong yang lta bu'i dgongs pas gtan la dbab par gsol bas/ de nyid du nyid kyi thugs yang
338a3(pha): pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'phro 'du phyogs thams cad du khyab par mdzad de gsungs pa/ e ma bsam brjod bral ba'i
338a4(pha): 'khor// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma nyon// nga yi klong las rab spros pa// nga yi klong las rang shar ba// dkyil 'khor nga yi dbyings la gsal// 'phro 'du nga yi dbying

338a6(pha): las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // rang snang sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// spros med spros dang bral ba'i don// spros bral ye shes
338a7(pha): chen po yi// spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sems kyi spros pa gcad de b+he// de b+haM gnad du bsnun pa la// ngo sprod gtan la dbab don du// mtshan
338b1(pha): nyid ldan pa'i bla ma gces// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus kyang // mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la// gus bdud 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas// de phyir
338b2(pha): mtshan nyid kun ldan pa'i// bla ma de ni sku yi cha// mdzes shing bag gro lhun chags pa// spyod lam gdul bya'i yid dang mthun// gang la gang 'dul thobs
338b3(pha): la mkhas// gsung gi chas 'jam zhing snyan// 'jig rten 'chal gtam bre mo nyung // dpenan chos kyi gsung char 'bebs// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung
338b4(pha): dang mthun// de bzhin thugs kyang mkha' ltar dag/ lta sgom gzhi 'bras don dang ldan// rang don bral zhing gzhan don la// brtse bas skyo du ba med par
338b5(pha): brtson// mdor na mdzad pa'i rnam thar rnams// bla med theg mchog chos dang 'thun// de ltar ldan pa'i bla ma btsal// rnyed nas lus ngag yid gsum gyis

338b7(pha): ltar bla ma bsten pa yi// bde legs bsam 'phel yid smon 'grub/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yang las/ mtshan nyid dang /

339a3(pha): blo yangs ser sna 'dzin chags chung // chos spyod brtson 'grus skye du ba med// bla ma la gus 'gro la brtsa// dam tshig la gnas g.yo sgyu med// khrel 'dzem ngo tsha chad

339b1(pha): mchog gtan la dbab// rgyal ba rnams kyis nges lung sbyin// yon tan de las log pa yi// skyon gyi rnam pa mang tshogs pa'i// dam med slob ma rgyang thag

339b6(pha): kyis// ye shes lha yi dgyes pa bskong // stang stabs gar gyis mnyes par bya// dpa' bo thabs kyis bde ba dang // dpa' mo shes rab stong nyid kyis// gnyis med

340a1(pha): gyis gzud par bya// dpa' bo yab dang dpa' mo yum// gnyis med rnam rol sems pa yi// ye shes myur du dbab par bya// phebs rtags 'dar dang

340a7(pha): yi nga rgyal ldan pa pos// gsang ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun// thabs shes slob ma'i lce steng dpag/ brda dang bcas pa'i ye shes bskyed// bde dang stong pa ngo sprad pas//
340b1(pha): lus ngag yid sems rab smin cing // khyad par ngag la nus pa 'bar// dpal dang gzi brjid rab 'phro zhing // dbang don dran pas don 'bras 'grub// e ma zla gsang

344b1(pha): khyab par byas// de las char dang tshub ma'i tshogs// rtsis las 'das par byung bzhin du// ming med pa las ming btags 'khrul// gcig las gnyis gyes ming gis
344b2(pha): tshogs/ phung po 'dus las grangs dang gzugs// rnam pa du mar g.yos pa yi// nga dang khyod dang phan tshun bcas// de las cher langs sred pa sogs// thun mong sna
344b3(pha): tshogs las su snang // dmigs pa can du 'dzin pa'i rkyen// 'bras bu sna tshogs rgyu ru 'khrul// yul can bdag por 'dzin pa yi// rkyen la sna tshogs mi 'byung 'khrul//

344b5(pha): pa// rnga dang dbyug gu phrad pa las// sgra byung ma phrad de mi grag/ bdag ces kun rtog phra mo las// gzhan zhes gnyis su snang la 'khrul// de yis de bskyed de sogs
